77 #ifdef CGAME
78 #define MEM_POOL_SIZE 128 * 1024
79 #else
80 #define MEM_POOL_SIZE 1024 * 1024
81 #endif
82 
83 static char memoryPool[MEM_POOL_SIZE];
84 static int allocPoint, outOfMemory;
85 
86 
87 /*
88 ===============
89 UI_Alloc
90 ===============
91 */
92 void *UI_Alloc( int size ) {
93  char *p;
94 
95  if ( allocPoint + size > MEM_POOL_SIZE ) {
96  outOfMemory = qtrue;
97  if (DC->Print) {
98  DC->Print("UI_Alloc: Failure. Out of memory!\n");
99  }
100  //DC->trap_Print(S_COLOR_YELLOW"WARNING: UI Out of Memory!\n");
101  return NULL;
102  }
103 
104  p = &memoryPool[allocPoint];
105 
106  allocPoint += ( size + 15 ) & ~15;
107 
108  return p;
109 }

114 ===============
115 */

117  allocPoint = 0;
118  outOfMemory = qfalse;
119 }
120 
121 qboolean UI_OutOfMemory( void ) {
122  return outOfMemory;
123 }

129 #define HASH_TABLE_SIZE 2048
130 /*
131 ================
132 return a hash value for the string
133 ================
134 */
135 static unsigned hashForString(const char *str) {
136  int i;
137  unsigned hash;
138  char letter;
139 
140  hash = 0;
141  i = 0;
142  while (str[i] != '\0') {
143  letter = tolower(str[i]);
144  hash+=(unsigned)(letter)*(i+119);
145  i++;
146  }
147  hash &= (HASH_TABLE_SIZE-1);
148  return hash;
149 }
150 
151 typedef struct stringDef_s {
152  struct stringDef_s *next;
153  const char *str;
154 } stringDef_t;
155 
156 static int strPoolIndex = 0;
157 static char strPool[STRING_POOL_SIZE];
158 
159 static int strHandleCount = 0;
160 static stringDef_t *strHandle[HASH_TABLE_SIZE];
161 
162 
163 const char *String_Alloc(const char *p) {
164  int len;
165  unsigned hash;
166  stringDef_t *str, *last;
167  static const char *staticNULL = "";
168 
169  if (p == NULL) {
170  return NULL;
171  }
172 
173  if (*p == 0) {
174  return staticNULL;
175  }
176 
177  hash = hashForString(p);
178 
179  str = strHandle[hash];
180  while (str) {
181  if (strcmp(p, str->str) == 0) {
182  return str->str;
183  }
184  str = str->next;
185  }
186 
187  len = strlen(p);
188  if (len + strPoolIndex + 1 < STRING_POOL_SIZE) {
189  int ph = strPoolIndex;
190  strcpy(&strPool[strPoolIndex], p);
191  strPoolIndex += len + 1;
192 
193  str = strHandle[hash];
194  last = str;
195  while (str && str->next) {
196  last = str;
197  str = str->next;
198  }
199 
200  str = UI_Alloc(sizeof(stringDef_t));
201  if (!str) {
202  return NULL;
203  }
204  str->next = NULL;
205  str->str = &strPool[ph];
206  if (last) {
207  last->next = str;
208  } else {
209  strHandle[hash] = str;
210  }
211  return &strPool[ph];
212  }
213  return NULL;
214 }
215 
216 void String_Report(void) {
217  float f;
218  Com_Printf("Memory/String Pool Info\n");
219  Com_Printf("----------------\n");
220  f = strPoolIndex;
221  f /= STRING_POOL_SIZE;
222  f *= 100;
223  Com_Printf("String Pool is %.1f%% full, %i bytes out of %i used.\n", f, strPoolIndex, STRING_POOL_SIZE);
224  f = allocPoint;
225  f /= MEM_POOL_SIZE;
226  f *= 100;
227  Com_Printf("Memory Pool is %.1f%% full, %i bytes out of %i used.\n", f, allocPoint, MEM_POOL_SIZE);
228 }

238  strHandle[i] = NULL;
239  }
240  strHandleCount = 0;
241  strPoolIndex = 0;
242  menuCount = 0;
243  openMenuCount = 0;
244  UI_InitMemory();

247  if (DC && DC->getBindingBuf) {

249  }

298 /*
299 =================
300 LerpColor
301 =================
302 */
303 void LerpColor(vec4_t a, vec4_t b, vec4_t c, float t)
304 {
305  int i;
306 
307  // lerp and clamp each component
308  for (i=0; i<4; i++)
309  {
310  c[i] = a[i] + t*(b[i]-a[i]);
311  if (c[i] < 0)
312  c[i] = 0;
313  else if (c[i] > 1.0)
314  c[i] = 1.0;
315  }
316 }

318 /*
319 =================
320 Float_Parse
321 =================
322 */
323 qboolean Float_Parse(char **p, float *f) {
324  char *token;
325  token = COM_ParseExt(p, qfalse);
326  if (token && token[0] != 0) {
327  *f = atof(token);
328  return qtrue;
329  } else {
330  return qfalse;
331  }
332 }
333 
334 /*
335 =================
336 PC_Float_Parse
337 =================
338 */
339 qboolean PC_Float_Parse(int handle, float *f) {
340  pc_token_t token;
341  int negative = qfalse;
342 
343  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
344  return qfalse;
345  if (token.string[0] == '-') {
346  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
347  return qfalse;
348  negative = qtrue;
349  }
350  if (token.type != TT_NUMBER) {
351  PC_SourceError(handle, "expected float but found %s", token.string);
352  return qfalse;
353  }
354  if (negative)
355  *f = -token.floatvalue;
356  else
357  *f = token.floatvalue;
358  return qtrue;
359 }
360 
361 /*
362 =================
363 Color_Parse
364 =================
365 */
366 qboolean Color_Parse(char **p, vec4_t *c) {
367  int i;
368  float f;
369 
370  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
371  if (!Float_Parse(p, &f)) {
372  return qfalse;
373  }
374  (*c)[i] = f;
375  }
376  return qtrue;
377 }
378 
379 /*
380 =================
381 PC_Color_Parse
382 =================
383 */
384 qboolean PC_Color_Parse(int handle, vec4_t *c) {
385  int i;
386  float f;
387 
388  for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
389  if (!PC_Float_Parse(handle, &f)) {
390  return qfalse;
391  }
392  (*c)[i] = f;
393  }
394  return qtrue;
395 }

402 qboolean Int_Parse(char **p, int *i) {
403  char *token;
404  token = COM_ParseExt(p, qfalse);
405 
406  if (token && token[0] != 0) {
407  *i = atoi(token);
408  return qtrue;
409  } else {
410  return qfalse;
411  }
412 }
413 
414 /*
415 =================
416 PC_Int_Parse
417 =================
418 */
419 qboolean PC_Int_Parse(int handle, int *i) {
420  pc_token_t token;
421  int negative = qfalse;
422 
423  if (!i)
424  return qfalse;
425  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
426  return qfalse;
427  if (token.string[0] == '-') {
428  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
429  return qfalse;
430  negative = qtrue;
431  }
432  if (token.type != TT_NUMBER) {
433  PC_SourceError(handle, "expected integer but found %s", token.string);
434  return qfalse;
435  }
436  *i = token.intvalue;
437  if (negative)
438  *i = - *i;
439  return qtrue;
440 }

447 qboolean Rect_Parse(char **p, rectDef_t *r) {
448  if (Float_Parse(p, &r->x)) {
449  if (Float_Parse(p, &r->y)) {
450  if (Float_Parse(p, &r->w)) {
451  if (Float_Parse(p, &r->h)) {
452  return qtrue;
453  }
454  }
455  }
456  }
457  return qfalse;
458 }

478 /*
479 =================
480 String_Parse
481 =================
482 */
483 qboolean String_Parse(char **p, const char **out) {
484  char *token;
485 
486  token = COM_ParseExt(p, qfalse);
487  if (token && token[0] != 0) {
488  *(out) = String_Alloc(token);
489  return qtrue;
490  }
491  return qfalse;
492 }

494 /*
495 =================
496 PC_String_Parse
497 =================
498 */
499 qboolean PC_String_Parse(int handle, const char **out) {
500  pc_token_t token;
501 
502  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
503  return qfalse;
504 
505  *(out) = String_Alloc(token.string);
506  return qtrue;
507 }
508 
509 /*
510 =================
511 PC_Script_Parse
512 =================
513 */
514 qboolean PC_Script_Parse(int handle, const char **out) {
515  char script[1024];
516  pc_token_t token;
517 
518  memset(script, 0, sizeof(script));
519  // scripts start with { and have ; separated command lists.. commands are command, arg..
520  // basically we want everything between the { } as it will be interpreted at run time
521 
522  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
523  return qfalse;
524  if (Q_stricmp(token.string, "{") != 0) {
525  return qfalse;
526  }
527 
528  while ( 1 ) {
529  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
530  return qfalse;
531 
532  if (Q_stricmp(token.string, "}") == 0) {
533  *out = String_Alloc(script);
534  return qtrue;
535  }
536 
537  if (token.string[1] != '\0') {
538  Q_strcat(script, 1024, va("\"%s\"", token.string));
539  } else {
540  Q_strcat(script, 1024, token.string);
541  }
542  Q_strcat(script, 1024, " ");
543  }
544  return qfalse;
545 }

585  w->cinematic = -1;

587 
588 void Fade(int *flags, float *f, float clamp, int *nextTime, int offsetTime, qboolean bFlags, float fadeAmount) {
589  if (*flags & (WINDOW_FADINGOUT | WINDOW_FADINGIN)) {
590  if (DC->realTime > *nextTime) {
591  *nextTime = DC->realTime + offsetTime;
592  if (*flags & WINDOW_FADINGOUT) {
593  *f -= fadeAmount;
594  if (bFlags && *f <= 0.0) {
595  *flags &= ~(WINDOW_FADINGOUT | WINDOW_VISIBLE);
596  }
597  } else {
598  *f += fadeAmount;
599  if (*f >= clamp) {
600  *f = clamp;
601  if (bFlags) {
602  *flags &= ~WINDOW_FADINGIN;
603  }
604  }
605  }
606  }
607  }
608 }

611 
612 void Window_Paint(Window *w, float fadeAmount, float fadeClamp, float fadeCycle) {
613  //float bordersize = 0;
614  vec4_t color = {0};
615  rectDef_t fillRect;
616 
617  if ( w == NULL ) {
618  return;
619  }
620 
621  if (debugMode) {
622  color[0] = color[1] = color[2] = color[3] = 1;
623  DC->drawRect(w->rect.x, w->rect.y, w->rect.w, w->rect.h, 1, color);
624  }
625 
626  if (w->style == 0 && w->border == 0) {
627  return;
628  }
629 
630  fillRect = w->rect;
631 
632  if (w->border != 0) {
633  fillRect.x += w->borderSize;
634  fillRect.y += w->borderSize;
635  fillRect.w -= w->borderSize + 1;
636  fillRect.h -= w->borderSize + 1;
637  }
638 
639  if (w->style == WINDOW_STYLE_FILLED) {
640  // box, but possible a shader that needs filled
641  if (w->background) {
642  Fade(&w->flags, &w->backColor[3], fadeClamp, &w->nextTime, fadeCycle, qtrue, fadeAmount);
643  DC->setColor(w->backColor);
644  DC->drawHandlePic(fillRect.x, fillRect.y, fillRect.w, fillRect.h, w->background);
645  DC->setColor(NULL);
646  } else {
647  DC->fillRect(fillRect.x, fillRect.y, fillRect.w, fillRect.h, w->backColor);
648  }
649  } else if (w->style == WINDOW_STYLE_GRADIENT) {
650  GradientBar_Paint(&fillRect, w->backColor);
651  // gradient bar
652  } else if (w->style == WINDOW_STYLE_SHADER) {
653  if (w->flags & WINDOW_FORECOLORSET) {
654  DC->setColor(w->foreColor);
655  }
656  DC->drawHandlePic(fillRect.x, fillRect.y, fillRect.w, fillRect.h, w->background);
657  DC->setColor(NULL);
658  } else if (w->style == WINDOW_STYLE_TEAMCOLOR) {
659  if (DC->getTeamColor) {
660  DC->getTeamColor(&color);
661  DC->fillRect(fillRect.x, fillRect.y, fillRect.w, fillRect.h, color);
662  }
663  } else if (w->style == WINDOW_STYLE_CINEMATIC) {
664  if (w->cinematic == -1) {
665  w->cinematic = DC->playCinematic(w->cinematicName, fillRect.x, fillRect.y, fillRect.w, fillRect.h);
666  if (w->cinematic == -1) {
667  w->cinematic = -2;
668  }
669  }
670  if (w->cinematic >= 0) {
671  DC->runCinematicFrame(w->cinematic);
672  DC->drawCinematic(w->cinematic, fillRect.x, fillRect.y, fillRect.w, fillRect.h);
673  }
674  }
675 
676  if (w->border == WINDOW_BORDER_FULL) {
677  // full
678  // HACK HACK HACK
679  if (w->style == WINDOW_STYLE_TEAMCOLOR) {
680  if (color[0] > 0) {
681  // red
682  color[0] = 1;
683  color[1] = color[2] = .5;
684 
685  } else {
686  color[2] = 1;
687  color[0] = color[1] = .5;
688  }
689  color[3] = 1;
690  DC->drawRect(w->rect.x, w->rect.y, w->rect.w, w->rect.h, w->borderSize, color);
691  } else {
692  DC->drawRect(w->rect.x, w->rect.y, w->rect.w, w->rect.h, w->borderSize, w->borderColor);
693  }
694  } else if (w->border == WINDOW_BORDER_HORZ) {
695  // top/bottom
696  DC->setColor(w->borderColor);
697  DC->drawTopBottom(w->rect.x, w->rect.y, w->rect.w, w->rect.h, w->borderSize);
698  DC->setColor( NULL );
699  } else if (w->border == WINDOW_BORDER_VERT) {
700  // left right
701  DC->setColor(w->borderColor);
702  DC->drawSides(w->rect.x, w->rect.y, w->rect.w, w->rect.h, w->borderSize);
703  DC->setColor( NULL );
704  } else if (w->border == WINDOW_BORDER_KCGRADIENT) {
705  // this is just two gradient bars along each horz edge
706  rectDef_t r = w->rect;
707  r.h = w->borderSize;
708  GradientBar_Paint(&r, w->borderColor);
709  r.y = w->rect.y + w->rect.h - 1;
710  GradientBar_Paint(&r, w->borderColor);
711  }
712 
713 }

716 void Item_SetScreenCoords(itemDef_t *item, float x, float y) {
717 
718  if (item == NULL) {
719  return;
720  }
721 
722  if (item->window.border != 0) {
723  x += item->window.borderSize;
724  y += item->window.borderSize;
725  }
726 
727  item->window.rect.x = x + item->window.rectClient.x;
728  item->window.rect.y = y + item->window.rectClient.y;
729  item->window.rect.w = item->window.rectClient.w;
730  item->window.rect.h = item->window.rectClient.h;
731 
732  // force the text rects to recompute
733  item->textRect.w = 0;
734  item->textRect.h = 0;
735 }

737 // FIXME: consolidate this with nearby stuff
738 void Item_UpdatePosition(itemDef_t *item) {
739  float x, y;
740  menuDef_t *menu;
741 
742  if (item == NULL || item->parent == NULL) {
743  return;
744  }
745 
746  menu = item->parent;
747 
748  x = menu->window.rect.x;
749  y = menu->window.rect.y;
750 
751  if (menu->window.border != 0) {
752  x += menu->window.borderSize;
753  y += menu->window.borderSize;
754  }
755 
756  Item_SetScreenCoords(item, x, y);
757 
758 }

760 // menus
761 void Menu_UpdatePosition(menuDef_t *menu) {
762  int i;
763  float x, y;
764 
765  if (menu == NULL) {
766  return;
767  }
768 
769  x = menu->window.rect.x;
770  y = menu->window.rect.y;
771  if (menu->window.border != 0) {
772  x += menu->window.borderSize;
773  y += menu->window.borderSize;
774  }
775 
776  for (i = 0; i < menu->itemCount; i++) {
777  Item_SetScreenCoords(menu->items[i], x, y);
778  }
779 }
780 
781 void Menu_PostParse(menuDef_t *menu) {
782  if (menu == NULL) {
783  return;
784  }
785  if (menu->fullScreen) {
786  menu->window.rect.x = 0;
787  menu->window.rect.y = 0;
788  menu->window.rect.w = 640;
789  menu->window.rect.h = 480;
790  }
791  Menu_UpdatePosition(menu);
792 }

794 itemDef_t *Menu_ClearFocus(menuDef_t *menu) {
795  int i;
796  itemDef_t *ret = NULL;
797 
798  if (menu == NULL) {
799  return NULL;
800  }
801 
802  for (i = 0; i < menu->itemCount; i++) {
803  if (menu->items[i]->window.flags & WINDOW_HASFOCUS) {
804  ret = menu->items[i];
805  }
806  menu->items[i]->window.flags &= ~WINDOW_HASFOCUS;
807  if (menu->items[i]->leaveFocus) {
808  Item_RunScript(menu->items[i], menu->items[i]->leaveFocus);
809  }
810  }
811 
812  return ret;
813 }

1116 void Menu_TransitionItemByName(menuDef_t *menu, const char *p, rectDef_t rectFrom, rectDef_t rectTo, int time, float amt) {
1117  itemDef_t *item;
1118  int i;
1119  int count = Menu_ItemsMatchingGroup(menu, p);
1120  for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
1121  item = Menu_GetMatchingItemByNumber(menu, i, p);
1122  if (item != NULL) {
1123  item->window.flags |= (WINDOW_INTRANSITION | WINDOW_VISIBLE);
1124  item->window.offsetTime = time;
1125  memcpy(&item->window.rectClient, &rectFrom, sizeof(rectDef_t));
1126  memcpy(&item->window.rectEffects, &rectTo, sizeof(rectDef_t));
1127  item->window.rectEffects2.x = fabs(rectTo.x - rectFrom.x) / amt;
1128  item->window.rectEffects2.y = fabs(rectTo.y - rectFrom.y) / amt;
1129  item->window.rectEffects2.w = fabs(rectTo.w - rectFrom.w) / amt;
1130  item->window.rectEffects2.h = fabs(rectTo.h - rectFrom.h) / amt;
1131  Item_UpdatePosition(item);
1132  }
1133  }
1134 }

1248 commandDef_t commandList[] =
1249 {
1250  {"fadein", &Script_FadeIn}, // group/name
1251  {"fadeout", &Script_FadeOut}, // group/name
1252  {"show", &Script_Show}, // group/name
1253  {"hide", &Script_Hide}, // group/name
1254  {"setcolor", &Script_SetColor}, // works on this
1255  {"open", &Script_Open}, // menu
1256  {"conditionalopen", &Script_ConditionalOpen}, // menu
1257  {"close", &Script_Close}, // menu
1258  {"setasset", &Script_SetAsset}, // works on this
1259  {"setbackground", &Script_SetBackground}, // works on this
1260  {"setitemcolor", &Script_SetItemColor}, // group/name
1261  {"setteamcolor", &Script_SetTeamColor}, // sets this background color to team color
1262  {"setfocus", &Script_SetFocus}, // sets this background color to team color
1263  {"setplayermodel", &Script_SetPlayerModel}, // sets this background color to team color
1264  {"setplayerhead", &Script_SetPlayerHead}, // sets this background color to team color
1265  {"transition", &Script_Transition}, // group/name
1266  {"setcvar", &Script_SetCvar}, // group/name
1267  {"exec", &Script_Exec}, // group/name
1268  {"play", &Script_Play}, // group/name
1269  {"playlooped", &Script_playLooped}, // group/name
1270  {"orbit", &Script_Orbit} // group/name
1271 };
1272 
1273 int scriptCommandCount = ARRAY_LEN(commandList);
1274 
1275 
1276 void Item_RunScript(itemDef_t *item, const char *s) {
1277  char script[1024], *p;
1278  int i;
1279  qboolean bRan;
1280  memset(script, 0, sizeof(script));
1281  if (item && s && s[0]) {
1282  Q_strcat(script, 1024, s);
1283  p = script;
1284  while (1) {
1285  const char *command;
1286  // expect command then arguments, ; ends command, NULL ends script
1287  if (!String_Parse(&p, &command)) {
1288  return;
1289  }
1290 
1291  if (command[0] == ';' && command[1] == '\0') {
1292  continue;
1293  }
1294 
1295  bRan = qfalse;
1296  for (i = 0; i < scriptCommandCount; i++) {
1297  if (Q_stricmp(command, commandList[i].name) == 0) {
1298  (commandList[i].handler(item, &p));
1299  bRan = qtrue;
1300  break;
1301  }
1302  }
1303  // not in our auto list, pass to handler
1304  if (!bRan) {
1305  DC->runScript(&p);
1306  }
1307  }
1308  }
1309 }
1310 
1311 
1312 qboolean Item_EnableShowViaCvar(itemDef_t *item, int flag) {
1313  char script[1024], *p;
1314  memset(script, 0, sizeof(script));
1315  if (item && item->enableCvar && *item->enableCvar && item->cvarTest && *item->cvarTest) {
1316  char buff[1024];
1317  DC->getCVarString(item->cvarTest, buff, sizeof(buff));
1318 
1319  Q_strcat(script, 1024, item->enableCvar);
1320  p = script;
1321  while (1) {
1322  const char *val;
1323  // expect value then ; or NULL, NULL ends list
1324  if (!String_Parse(&p, &val)) {
1325  return (item->cvarFlags & flag) ? qfalse : qtrue;
1326  }
1327 
1328  if (val[0] == ';' && val[1] == '\0') {
1329  continue;
1330  }
1331 
1332  // enable it if any of the values are true
1333  if (item->cvarFlags & flag) {
1334  if (Q_stricmp(buff, val) == 0) {
1335  return qtrue;
1336  }
1337  } else {
1338  // disable it if any of the values are true
1339  if (Q_stricmp(buff, val) == 0) {
1340  return qfalse;
1341  }
1342  }
1343 
1344  }
1345  return (item->cvarFlags & flag) ? qfalse : qtrue;
1346  }
1347  return qtrue;
1348 }
1349 
1350 
1351 // will optionaly set focus to this item
1352 qboolean Item_SetFocus(itemDef_t *item, float x, float y) {
1353  int i;
1354  itemDef_t *oldFocus;
1355  sfxHandle_t *sfx = &DC->Assets.itemFocusSound;
1356  qboolean playSound = qfalse;
1357  menuDef_t *parent;
1358  // sanity check, non-null, not a decoration and does not already have the focus
1359  if (item == NULL || item->window.flags & WINDOW_DECORATION || item->window.flags & WINDOW_HASFOCUS || !(item->window.flags & WINDOW_VISIBLE)) {
1360  return qfalse;
1361  }
1362 
1363  // this can be NULL
1364  parent = (menuDef_t*)item->parent;
1365 
1366  // items can be enabled and disabled based on cvars
1367  if (item->cvarFlags & (CVAR_ENABLE | CVAR_DISABLE) && !Item_EnableShowViaCvar(item, CVAR_ENABLE)) {
1368  return qfalse;
1369  }
1370 
1371  if (item->cvarFlags & (CVAR_SHOW | CVAR_HIDE) && !Item_EnableShowViaCvar(item, CVAR_SHOW)) {
1372  return qfalse;
1373  }
1374 
1375  oldFocus = Menu_ClearFocus(item->parent);
1376 
1377  if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_TEXT) {
1378  rectDef_t r;
1379  r = item->textRect;
1380  r.y -= r.h;
1381  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1382  item->window.flags |= WINDOW_HASFOCUS;
1383  if (item->focusSound) {
1384  sfx = &item->focusSound;
1385  }
1386  playSound = qtrue;
1387  } else {
1388  if (oldFocus) {
1389  oldFocus->window.flags |= WINDOW_HASFOCUS;
1390  if (oldFocus->onFocus) {
1391  Item_RunScript(oldFocus, oldFocus->onFocus);
1392  }
1393  }
1394  }
1395  } else {
1396  item->window.flags |= WINDOW_HASFOCUS;
1397  if (item->onFocus) {
1398  Item_RunScript(item, item->onFocus);
1399  }
1400  if (item->focusSound) {
1401  sfx = &item->focusSound;
1402  }
1403  playSound = qtrue;
1404  }
1405 
1406  if (playSound && sfx) {
1407  DC->startLocalSound( *sfx, CHAN_LOCAL_SOUND );
1408  }
1409 
1410  for (i = 0; i < parent->itemCount; i++) {
1411  if (parent->items[i] == item) {
1412  parent->cursorItem = i;
1413  break;
1414  }
1415  }
1416 
1417  return qtrue;
1418 }
1419 
1420 int Item_ListBox_MaxScroll(itemDef_t *item) {
1421  listBoxDef_t *listPtr = (listBoxDef_t*)item->typeData;
1422  int count = DC->feederCount(item->special);
1423  int max;
1424 
1425  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_HORIZONTAL) {
1426  max = count - (item->window.rect.w / listPtr->elementWidth) + 1;
1427  }
1428  else {
1429  max = count - (item->window.rect.h / listPtr->elementHeight) + 1;
1430  }
1431  if (max < 0) {
1432  return 0;
1433  }
1434  return max;
1435 }

1437 int Item_ListBox_ThumbPosition(itemDef_t *item) {
1438  float max, pos, size;
1439  listBoxDef_t *listPtr = (listBoxDef_t*)item->typeData;
1440 
1441  max = Item_ListBox_MaxScroll(item);
1442  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_HORIZONTAL) {
1443  size = item->window.rect.w - (SCROLLBAR_SIZE * 2) - 2;
1444  if (max > 0) {
1445  pos = (size-SCROLLBAR_SIZE) / (float) max;
1446  } else {
1447  pos = 0;
1448  }
1449  pos *= listPtr->startPos;
1450  return item->window.rect.x + 1 + SCROLLBAR_SIZE + pos;
1451  }
1452  else {
1453  size = item->window.rect.h - (SCROLLBAR_SIZE * 2) - 2;
1454  if (max > 0) {
1455  pos = (size-SCROLLBAR_SIZE) / (float) max;
1456  } else {
1457  pos = 0;
1458  }
1459  pos *= listPtr->startPos;
1460  return item->window.rect.y + 1 + SCROLLBAR_SIZE + pos;
1461  }
1462 }

1464 int Item_ListBox_ThumbDrawPosition(itemDef_t *item) {
1465  int min, max;
1466 
1467  if (itemCapture == item) {
1468  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_HORIZONTAL) {
1469  min = item->window.rect.x + SCROLLBAR_SIZE + 1;
1470  max = item->window.rect.x + item->window.rect.w - 2*SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1;
1471  if (DC->cursorx >= min + SCROLLBAR_SIZE/2 && DC->cursorx <= max + SCROLLBAR_SIZE/2) {
1472  return DC->cursorx - SCROLLBAR_SIZE/2;
1473  }
1474  else {
1475  return Item_ListBox_ThumbPosition(item);
1476  }
1477  }
1478  else {
1479  min = item->window.rect.y + SCROLLBAR_SIZE + 1;
1480  max = item->window.rect.y + item->window.rect.h - 2*SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1;
1481  if (DC->cursory >= min + SCROLLBAR_SIZE/2 && DC->cursory <= max + SCROLLBAR_SIZE/2) {
1482  return DC->cursory - SCROLLBAR_SIZE/2;
1483  }
1484  else {
1485  return Item_ListBox_ThumbPosition(item);
1486  }
1487  }
1488  }
1489  else {
1490  return Item_ListBox_ThumbPosition(item);
1491  }
1492 }

1494 float Item_Slider_ThumbPosition(itemDef_t *item) {
1495  float value, range, x;
1496  editFieldDef_t *editDef = item->typeData;
1497 
1498  if (item->text) {
1499  x = item->textRect.x + item->textRect.w + 8;
1500  } else {
1501  x = item->window.rect.x;
1502  }
1503 
1504  if (!editDef || !item->cvar) {
1505  return x;
1506  }
1507 
1508  value = DC->getCVarValue(item->cvar);
1509 
1510  if (value < editDef->minVal) {
1511  value = editDef->minVal;
1512  } else if (value > editDef->maxVal) {
1513  value = editDef->maxVal;
1514  }
1515 
1516  range = editDef->maxVal - editDef->minVal;
1517  value -= editDef->minVal;
1518  value /= range;
1519  //value /= (editDef->maxVal - editDef->minVal);
1520  value *= SLIDER_WIDTH;
1521  x += value;
1522  // vm fuckage
1523  //x = x + (((float)value / editDef->maxVal) * SLIDER_WIDTH);
1524  return x;
1525 }

1541 int Item_ListBox_OverLB(itemDef_t *item, float x, float y) {
1542  rectDef_t r;
1543  int thumbstart;
1544 
1545  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_HORIZONTAL) {
1546  // check if on left arrow
1547  r.x = item->window.rect.x;
1548  r.y = item->window.rect.y + item->window.rect.h - SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1549  r.h = r.w = SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1550  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1551  return WINDOW_LB_LEFTARROW;
1552  }
1553  // check if on right arrow
1554  r.x = item->window.rect.x + item->window.rect.w - SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1555  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1556  return WINDOW_LB_RIGHTARROW;
1557  }
1558  // check if on thumb
1559  thumbstart = Item_ListBox_ThumbPosition(item);
1560  r.x = thumbstart;
1561  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1562  return WINDOW_LB_THUMB;
1563  }
1564  r.x = item->window.rect.x + SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1565  r.w = thumbstart - r.x;
1566  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1567  return WINDOW_LB_PGUP;
1568  }
1569  r.x = thumbstart + SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1570  r.w = item->window.rect.x + item->window.rect.w - SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1571  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1572  return WINDOW_LB_PGDN;
1573  }
1574  } else {
1575  r.x = item->window.rect.x + item->window.rect.w - SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1576  r.y = item->window.rect.y;
1577  r.h = r.w = SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1578  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1579  return WINDOW_LB_LEFTARROW;
1580  }
1581  r.y = item->window.rect.y + item->window.rect.h - SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1582  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1583  return WINDOW_LB_RIGHTARROW;
1584  }
1585  thumbstart = Item_ListBox_ThumbPosition(item);
1586  r.y = thumbstart;
1587  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1588  return WINDOW_LB_THUMB;
1589  }
1590  r.y = item->window.rect.y + SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1591  r.h = thumbstart - r.y;
1592  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1593  return WINDOW_LB_PGUP;
1594  }
1595  r.y = thumbstart + SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1596  r.h = item->window.rect.y + item->window.rect.h - SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1597  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1598  return WINDOW_LB_PGDN;
1599  }
1600  }
1601  return 0;
1602 }

1605 void Item_ListBox_MouseEnter(itemDef_t *item, float x, float y)
1606 {
1607  rectDef_t r;
1608  listBoxDef_t *listPtr = (listBoxDef_t*)item->typeData;
1609 
1610  item->window.flags &= ~(WINDOW_LB_LEFTARROW | WINDOW_LB_RIGHTARROW | WINDOW_LB_THUMB | WINDOW_LB_PGUP | WINDOW_LB_PGDN);
1611  item->window.flags |= Item_ListBox_OverLB(item, x, y);
1612 
1613  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_HORIZONTAL) {
1614  if (!(item->window.flags & (WINDOW_LB_LEFTARROW | WINDOW_LB_RIGHTARROW | WINDOW_LB_THUMB | WINDOW_LB_PGUP | WINDOW_LB_PGDN))) {
1615  // check for selection hit as we have exausted buttons and thumb
1616  if (listPtr->elementStyle == LISTBOX_IMAGE) {
1617  r.x = item->window.rect.x;
1618  r.y = item->window.rect.y;
1619  r.h = item->window.rect.h - SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1620  r.w = item->window.rect.w - listPtr->drawPadding;
1621  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1622  listPtr->cursorPos = (int)((x - r.x) / listPtr->elementWidth) + listPtr->startPos;
1623  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= listPtr->endPos) {
1624  listPtr->cursorPos = listPtr->endPos;
1625  }
1626  }
1627  } else {
1628  // text hit..
1629  }
1630  }
1631  } else if (!(item->window.flags & (WINDOW_LB_LEFTARROW | WINDOW_LB_RIGHTARROW | WINDOW_LB_THUMB | WINDOW_LB_PGUP | WINDOW_LB_PGDN))) {
1632  r.x = item->window.rect.x;
1633  r.y = item->window.rect.y;
1634  r.w = item->window.rect.w - SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
1635  r.h = item->window.rect.h - listPtr->drawPadding;
1636  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1637  listPtr->cursorPos = (int)((y - 2 - r.y) / listPtr->elementHeight) + listPtr->startPos;
1638  if (listPtr->cursorPos > listPtr->endPos) {
1639  listPtr->cursorPos = listPtr->endPos;
1640  }
1641  }
1642  }
1643 }
1644 
1645 void Item_MouseEnter(itemDef_t *item, float x, float y) {
1646  rectDef_t r;
1647  if (item) {
1648  r = item->textRect;
1649  r.y -= r.h;
1650  // in the text rect?
1651 
1652  // items can be enabled and disabled based on cvars
1653  if (item->cvarFlags & (CVAR_ENABLE | CVAR_DISABLE) && !Item_EnableShowViaCvar(item, CVAR_ENABLE)) {
1654  return;
1655  }
1656 
1657  if (item->cvarFlags & (CVAR_SHOW | CVAR_HIDE) && !Item_EnableShowViaCvar(item, CVAR_SHOW)) {
1658  return;
1659  }
1660 
1661  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&r, x, y)) {
1662  if (!(item->window.flags & WINDOW_MOUSEOVERTEXT)) {
1663  Item_RunScript(item, item->mouseEnterText);
1664  item->window.flags |= WINDOW_MOUSEOVERTEXT;
1665  }
1666  if (!(item->window.flags & WINDOW_MOUSEOVER)) {
1667  Item_RunScript(item, item->mouseEnter);
1668  item->window.flags |= WINDOW_MOUSEOVER;
1669  }
1670 
1671  } else {
1672  // not in the text rect
1673  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_MOUSEOVERTEXT) {
1674  // if we were
1675  Item_RunScript(item, item->mouseExitText);
1676  item->window.flags &= ~WINDOW_MOUSEOVERTEXT;
1677  }
1678  if (!(item->window.flags & WINDOW_MOUSEOVER)) {
1679  Item_RunScript(item, item->mouseEnter);
1680  item->window.flags |= WINDOW_MOUSEOVER;
1681  }
1682 
1683  if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_LISTBOX) {
1684  Item_ListBox_MouseEnter(item, x, y);
1685  }
1686  }
1687  }
1688 }
1689 
1690 void Item_MouseLeave(itemDef_t *item) {
1691  if (item) {
1692  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_MOUSEOVERTEXT) {
1693  Item_RunScript(item, item->mouseExitText);
1694  item->window.flags &= ~WINDOW_MOUSEOVERTEXT;
1695  }
1696  Item_RunScript(item, item->mouseExit);
1697  item->window.flags &= ~(WINDOW_LB_RIGHTARROW | WINDOW_LB_LEFTARROW);
1698  }
1699 }

1729 qboolean Item_ListBox_HandleKey(itemDef_t *item, int key, qboolean down, qboolean force) {
1730  listBoxDef_t *listPtr = (listBoxDef_t*)item->typeData;
1731  int count = DC->feederCount(item->special);
1732  int max, viewmax;
1733 
1734  if (force || (Rect_ContainsPoint(&item->window.rect, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory) && item->window.flags & WINDOW_HASFOCUS)) {
1735  max = Item_ListBox_MaxScroll(item);
1736  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_HORIZONTAL) {
1737  viewmax = (item->window.rect.w / listPtr->elementWidth);
1738  if ( key == K_LEFTARROW || key == K_KP_LEFTARROW )
1739  {
1740  if (!listPtr->notselectable) {
1741  listPtr->cursorPos--;
1742  if (listPtr->cursorPos < 0) {
1743  listPtr->cursorPos = 0;
1744  }
1745  if (listPtr->cursorPos < listPtr->startPos) {
1746  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1747  }
1748  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= listPtr->startPos + viewmax) {
1749  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos - viewmax + 1;
1750  }
1751  item->cursorPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1752  DC->feederSelection(item->special, item->cursorPos);
1753  }
1754  else {
1755  listPtr->startPos--;
1756  if (listPtr->startPos < 0)
1757  listPtr->startPos = 0;
1758  }
1759  return qtrue;
1760  }
1761  if ( key == K_RIGHTARROW || key == K_KP_RIGHTARROW )
1762  {
1763  if (!listPtr->notselectable) {
1764  listPtr->cursorPos++;
1765  if (listPtr->cursorPos < listPtr->startPos) {
1766  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1767  }
1768  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= count) {
1769  listPtr->cursorPos = count-1;
1770  }
1771  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= listPtr->startPos + viewmax) {
1772  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos - viewmax + 1;
1773  }
1774  item->cursorPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1775  DC->feederSelection(item->special, item->cursorPos);
1776  }
1777  else {
1778  listPtr->startPos++;
1779  if (listPtr->startPos >= count)
1780  listPtr->startPos = count-1;
1781  }
1782  return qtrue;
1783  }
1784  }
1785  else {
1786  viewmax = (item->window.rect.h / listPtr->elementHeight);
1787  if ( key == K_UPARROW || key == K_KP_UPARROW )
1788  {
1789  if (!listPtr->notselectable) {
1790  listPtr->cursorPos--;
1791  if (listPtr->cursorPos < 0) {
1792  listPtr->cursorPos = 0;
1793  }
1794  if (listPtr->cursorPos < listPtr->startPos) {
1795  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1796  }
1797  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= listPtr->startPos + viewmax) {
1798  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos - viewmax + 1;
1799  }
1800  item->cursorPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1801  DC->feederSelection(item->special, item->cursorPos);
1802  }
1803  else {
1804  listPtr->startPos--;
1805  if (listPtr->startPos < 0)
1806  listPtr->startPos = 0;
1807  }
1808  return qtrue;
1809  }
1810  if ( key == K_DOWNARROW || key == K_KP_DOWNARROW )
1811  {
1812  if (!listPtr->notselectable) {
1813  listPtr->cursorPos++;
1814  if (listPtr->cursorPos < listPtr->startPos) {
1815  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1816  }
1817  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= count) {
1818  listPtr->cursorPos = count-1;
1819  }
1820  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= listPtr->startPos + viewmax) {
1821  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos - viewmax + 1;
1822  }
1823  item->cursorPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1824  DC->feederSelection(item->special, item->cursorPos);
1825  }
1826  else {
1827  listPtr->startPos++;
1828  if (listPtr->startPos > max)
1829  listPtr->startPos = max;
1830  }
1831  return qtrue;
1832  }
1833  }
1834 
1835  // Use mouse wheel in vertical and horizontal menus.
1836  // If scrolling 3 items would replace over half of the
1837  // displayed items, only scroll 1 item at a time.
1838  if ( key == K_MWHEELUP ) {
1839  int scroll = viewmax < 6 ? 1 : 3;
1840  listPtr->startPos -= scroll;
1841  if (listPtr->startPos < 0) {
1842  listPtr->startPos = 0;
1843  }
1844  return qtrue;
1845  }
1846  if ( key == K_MWHEELDOWN ) {
1847  int scroll = viewmax < 6 ? 1 : 3;
1848  listPtr->startPos += scroll;
1849  if (listPtr->startPos > max) {
1850  listPtr->startPos = max;
1851  }
1852  return qtrue;
1853  }
1854 
1855  // mouse hit
1856  if (key == K_MOUSE1 || key == K_MOUSE2) {
1857  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_LB_LEFTARROW) {
1858  listPtr->startPos--;
1859  if (listPtr->startPos < 0) {
1860  listPtr->startPos = 0;
1861  }
1862  } else if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_LB_RIGHTARROW) {
1863  // one down
1864  listPtr->startPos++;
1865  if (listPtr->startPos > max) {
1866  listPtr->startPos = max;
1867  }
1868  } else if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_LB_PGUP) {
1869  // page up
1870  listPtr->startPos -= viewmax;
1871  if (listPtr->startPos < 0) {
1872  listPtr->startPos = 0;
1873  }
1874  } else if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_LB_PGDN) {
1875  // page down
1876  listPtr->startPos += viewmax;
1877  if (listPtr->startPos > max) {
1878  listPtr->startPos = max;
1879  }
1880  } else if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_LB_THUMB) {
1881  // Display_SetCaptureItem(item);
1882  } else {
1883  // select an item
1884  if (DC->realTime < lastListBoxClickTime && listPtr->doubleClick) {
1885  Item_RunScript(item, listPtr->doubleClick);
1886  }
1887  lastListBoxClickTime = DC->realTime + DOUBLE_CLICK_DELAY;
1888  if (item->cursorPos != listPtr->cursorPos) {
1889  item->cursorPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1890  DC->feederSelection(item->special, item->cursorPos);
1891  }
1892  }
1893  return qtrue;
1894  }
1895  if ( key == K_HOME || key == K_KP_HOME) {
1896  // home
1897  listPtr->startPos = 0;
1898  return qtrue;
1899  }
1900  if ( key == K_END || key == K_KP_END) {
1901  // end
1902  listPtr->startPos = max;
1903  return qtrue;
1904  }
1905  if (key == K_PGUP || key == K_KP_PGUP ) {
1906  // page up
1907  if (!listPtr->notselectable) {
1908  listPtr->cursorPos -= viewmax;
1909  if (listPtr->cursorPos < 0) {
1910  listPtr->cursorPos = 0;
1911  }
1912  if (listPtr->cursorPos < listPtr->startPos) {
1913  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1914  }
1915  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= listPtr->startPos + viewmax) {
1916  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos - viewmax + 1;
1917  }
1918  item->cursorPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1919  DC->feederSelection(item->special, item->cursorPos);
1920  }
1921  else {
1922  listPtr->startPos -= viewmax;
1923  if (listPtr->startPos < 0) {
1924  listPtr->startPos = 0;
1925  }
1926  }
1927  return qtrue;
1928  }
1929  if ( key == K_PGDN || key == K_KP_PGDN ) {
1930  // page down
1931  if (!listPtr->notselectable) {
1932  listPtr->cursorPos += viewmax;
1933  if (listPtr->cursorPos < listPtr->startPos) {
1934  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1935  }
1936  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= count) {
1937  listPtr->cursorPos = count-1;
1938  }
1939  if (listPtr->cursorPos >= listPtr->startPos + viewmax) {
1940  listPtr->startPos = listPtr->cursorPos - viewmax + 1;
1941  }
1942  item->cursorPos = listPtr->cursorPos;
1943  DC->feederSelection(item->special, item->cursorPos);
1944  }
1945  else {
1946  listPtr->startPos += viewmax;
1947  if (listPtr->startPos > max) {
1948  listPtr->startPos = max;
1949  }
1950  }
1951  return qtrue;
1952  }
1953  }
1954  return qfalse;
1955 }

1957 qboolean Item_YesNo_HandleKey(itemDef_t *item, int key) {
1958 
1959  if (item->cvar) {
1960  qboolean action = qfalse;
1961  if (key == K_MOUSE1 || key == K_MOUSE2 || key == K_MOUSE3) {
1962  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&item->window.rect, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory) && item->window.flags & WINDOW_HASFOCUS) {
1963  action = qtrue;

1966  action = qtrue;

1969  DC->setCVar(item->cvar, va("%i", !DC->getCVarValue(item->cvar)));
1970  return qtrue;
1971  }
1972  }
1973 
1974  return qfalse;
1975

1986 int Item_Multi_FindCvarByValue(itemDef_t *item) {
1987  char buff[1024];
1988  float value = 0;
1989  int i;
1990  multiDef_t *multiPtr = (multiDef_t*)item->typeData;
1991  if (multiPtr) {
1992  if (multiPtr->strDef) {
1993  DC->getCVarString(item->cvar, buff, sizeof(buff));
1994  } else {
1995  value = DC->getCVarValue(item->cvar);
1996  }
1997  for (i = 0; i < multiPtr->count; i++) {
1998  if (multiPtr->strDef) {
1999  if (Q_stricmp(buff, multiPtr->cvarStr[i]) == 0) {
2000  return i;
2001  }
2002  } else {
2003  if (multiPtr->cvarValue[i] == value) {
2004  return i;
2005  }
2006  }
2007  }
2008  }
2009  return 0;
2010 }
2011 
2012 const char *Item_Multi_Setting(itemDef_t *item) {
2013  char buff[1024];
2014  float value = 0;
2015  int i;
2016  multiDef_t *multiPtr = (multiDef_t*)item->typeData;
2017  if (multiPtr) {
2018  if (multiPtr->strDef) {
2019  DC->getCVarString(item->cvar, buff, sizeof(buff));
2020  } else {
2021  value = DC->getCVarValue(item->cvar);
2022  }
2023  for (i = 0; i < multiPtr->count; i++) {
2024  if (multiPtr->strDef) {
2025  if (Q_stricmp(buff, multiPtr->cvarStr[i]) == 0) {
2026  return multiPtr->cvarList[i];
2027  }
2028  } else {
2029  if (multiPtr->cvarValue[i] == value) {
2030  return multiPtr->cvarList[i];
2031  }
2032  }
2033  }
2034  }
2035  return "";
2036 }

2038 qboolean Item_Multi_HandleKey(itemDef_t *item, int key) {
2039  multiDef_t *multiPtr = (multiDef_t*)item->typeData;
2040  if (multiPtr) {
2041  if (item->cvar) {
2042  int select = 0;
2043  if (key == K_MOUSE1 || key == K_MOUSE2 || key == K_MOUSE3) {
2044  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&item->window.rect, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory) && item->window.flags & WINDOW_HASFOCUS) {
2045  select = (key == K_MOUSE2) ? -1 : 1;
2046  }
2047  } else {
2048  select = UI_SelectForKey(key);
2049  }
2050  if (select != 0) {
2051  int current = Item_Multi_FindCvarByValue(item) + select;
2052  int max = Item_Multi_CountSettings(item);
2053  if ( current < 0 ) {
2054  current = max-1;
2055  } else if ( current >= max ) {
2056  current = 0;
2057  }
2058 
2059  if (multiPtr->videoMode) {
2060  if (multiPtr->cvarValue[current] != -1) {
2061  DC->setCVar("r_mode", va("%i", (int) multiPtr->cvarValue[current] ));
2062  } else {
2063  int w, h;
2064  char *x;
2065  char str[8];
2066 
2067  x = strchr( multiPtr->cvarStr[current], 'x' ) + 1;
2068  Q_strncpyz( str, multiPtr->cvarStr[current], MIN( x-multiPtr->cvarStr[current], sizeof( str ) ) );
2069  w = atoi( str );
2070  h = atoi( x );
2071 
2072  DC->setCVar("r_mode", "-1");
2073  DC->setCVar("r_customwidth", va("%i", w));
2074  DC->setCVar("r_customheight", va("%i", h));
2075  }
2076  }
2077 
2078  if (multiPtr->strDef) {
2079  DC->setCVar(item->cvar, multiPtr->cvarStr[current]);
2080  } else {
2081  float value = multiPtr->cvarValue[current];
2082  if (((float)((int) value)) == value) {
2083  DC->setCVar(item->cvar, va("%i", (int) value ));
2084  }
2085  else {
2086  DC->setCVar(item->cvar, va("%f", value ));
2087  }
2088  }
2089  return qtrue;
2090  }
2091  }
2092  }
2093  return qfalse;
2094 }

2096 qboolean Item_TextField_HandleKey(itemDef_t *item, int key) {
2097  char buff[1024];
2098  int len;
2099  itemDef_t *newItem = NULL;
2100  editFieldDef_t *editPtr = (editFieldDef_t*)item->typeData;
2101 
2102  if (item->cvar) {
2103 
2104  memset(buff, 0, sizeof(buff));
2105  DC->getCVarString(item->cvar, buff, sizeof(buff));
2106  len = strlen(buff);
2107  if (editPtr->maxChars && len > editPtr->maxChars) {
2108  len = editPtr->maxChars;
2109  }
2110  if ( key & K_CHAR_FLAG ) {
2111  key &= ~K_CHAR_FLAG;
2112 
2113 
2114  if (key == 'h' - 'a' + 1 ) { // ctrl-h is backspace
2115  if ( item->cursorPos > 0 ) {
2116  memmove( &buff[item->cursorPos - 1], &buff[item->cursorPos], len + 1 - item->cursorPos);
2117  item->cursorPos--;
2118  if (item->cursorPos < editPtr->paintOffset) {
2119  editPtr->paintOffset--;
2120  }
2121  }
2122  DC->setCVar(item->cvar, buff);
2123  return qtrue;
2124  }
2125 
2126 
2127  //
2128  // ignore any non printable chars
2129  //
2130  if ( key < 32 || !item->cvar) {
2131  return qtrue;
2132  }
2133 
2134  if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_NUMERICFIELD) {
2135  if (key < '0' || key > '9') {
2136  return qfalse;
2137  }
2138  }
2139 
2140  if (!DC->getOverstrikeMode()) {
2141  if (( len == MAX_EDITFIELD - 1 ) || (editPtr->maxChars && len >= editPtr->maxChars)) {
2142  return qtrue;
2143  }
2144  memmove( &buff[item->cursorPos + 1], &buff[item->cursorPos], len + 1 - item->cursorPos );
2145  } else {
2146  if (editPtr->maxChars && item->cursorPos >= editPtr->maxChars) {
2147  return qtrue;
2148  }
2149  }
2150 
2151  buff[item->cursorPos] = key;
2152 
2153  DC->setCVar(item->cvar, buff);
2154 
2155  if (item->cursorPos < len + 1) {
2156  item->cursorPos++;
2157  if (editPtr->maxPaintChars && item->cursorPos > editPtr->maxPaintChars) {
2158  editPtr->paintOffset++;
2159  }
2160  }
2161 
2162  } else {
2163 
2164  if ( key == K_DEL || key == K_KP_DEL ) {
2165  if ( item->cursorPos < len ) {
2166  memmove( buff + item->cursorPos, buff + item->cursorPos + 1, len - item->cursorPos);
2167  DC->setCVar(item->cvar, buff);
2168  }
2169  return qtrue;
2170  }
2171 
2172  if ( key == K_RIGHTARROW || key == K_KP_RIGHTARROW )
2173  {
2174  if (editPtr->maxPaintChars && item->cursorPos >= editPtr->maxPaintChars && item->cursorPos < len) {
2175  item->cursorPos++;
2176  editPtr->paintOffset++;
2177  return qtrue;
2178  }
2179  if (item->cursorPos < len) {
2180  item->cursorPos++;
2181  }
2182  return qtrue;
2183  }
2184 
2185  if ( key == K_LEFTARROW || key == K_KP_LEFTARROW )
2186  {
2187  if ( item->cursorPos > 0 ) {
2188  item->cursorPos--;
2189  }
2190  if (item->cursorPos < editPtr->paintOffset) {
2191  editPtr->paintOffset--;
2192  }
2193  return qtrue;
2194  }
2195 
2196  if ( key == K_HOME || key == K_KP_HOME) {// || ( tolower(key) == 'a' && trap_Key_IsDown( K_CTRL ) ) ) {
2197  item->cursorPos = 0;
2198  editPtr->paintOffset = 0;
2199  return qtrue;
2200  }
2201 
2202  if ( key == K_END || key == K_KP_END) {// ( tolower(key) == 'e' && trap_Key_IsDown( K_CTRL ) ) ) {
2203  item->cursorPos = len;
2204  if(item->cursorPos > editPtr->maxPaintChars) {
2205  editPtr->paintOffset = len - editPtr->maxPaintChars;
2206  }
2207  return qtrue;
2208  }
2209 
2210  if ( key == K_INS || key == K_KP_INS ) {
2211  DC->setOverstrikeMode(!DC->getOverstrikeMode());
2212  return qtrue;
2213  }
2214  }
2215 
2216  if (key == K_TAB || key == K_DOWNARROW || key == K_KP_DOWNARROW) {
2217  newItem = Menu_SetNextCursorItem(item->parent);
2218  if (newItem && (newItem->type == ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD || newItem->type == ITEM_TYPE_NUMERICFIELD)) {
2219  g_editItem = newItem;
2220  }
2221  }
2222 
2223  if (key == K_UPARROW || key == K_KP_UPARROW) {
2224  newItem = Menu_SetPrevCursorItem(item->parent);
2225  if (newItem && (newItem->type == ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD || newItem->type == ITEM_TYPE_NUMERICFIELD)) {
2226  g_editItem = newItem;
2227  }
2228  }
2229 
2230  if ( key == K_ENTER || key == K_KP_ENTER || key == K_ESCAPE) {
2231  return qfalse;
2232  }
2233 
2234  return qtrue;
2235  }
2236  return qfalse;
2237 
2238 }

2240 static void Scroll_ListBox_AutoFunc(void *p) {
2241  scrollInfo_t *si = (scrollInfo_t*)p;
2242  if (DC->realTime > si->nextScrollTime) {
2243  // need to scroll which is done by simulating a click to the item
2244  // this is done a bit sideways as the autoscroll "knows" that the item is a listbox
2245  // so it calls it directly
2246  Item_ListBox_HandleKey(si->item, si->scrollKey, qtrue, qfalse);
2247  si->nextScrollTime = DC->realTime + si->adjustValue;
2248  }
2249 
2250  if (DC->realTime > si->nextAdjustTime) {
2251  si->nextAdjustTime = DC->realTime + SCROLL_TIME_ADJUST;
2252  if (si->adjustValue > SCROLL_TIME_FLOOR) {
2253  si->adjustValue -= SCROLL_TIME_ADJUSTOFFSET;
2254  }
2255  }
2256 }

2258 static void Scroll_ListBox_ThumbFunc(void *p) {
2259  scrollInfo_t *si = (scrollInfo_t*)p;
2260  rectDef_t r;
2261  int pos, max;
2262 
2263  listBoxDef_t *listPtr = (listBoxDef_t*)si->item->typeData;
2264  if (si->item->window.flags & WINDOW_HORIZONTAL) {
2265  if (DC->cursorx == si->xStart) {
2266  return;
2267  }
2268  r.x = si->item->window.rect.x + SCROLLBAR_SIZE + 1;
2269  r.y = si->item->window.rect.y + si->item->window.rect.h - SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1;

2271  r.w = si->item->window.rect.w - (SCROLLBAR_SIZE*2) - 2;
2272  max = Item_ListBox_MaxScroll(si->item);
2273  //
2274  pos = (DC->cursorx - r.x - SCROLLBAR_SIZE/2) * max / (r.w - SCROLLBAR_SIZE);
2275  if (pos < 0) {
2276  pos = 0;
2277  }
2278  else if (pos > max) {
2279  pos = max;
2280  }
2281  listPtr->startPos = pos;
2282  si->xStart = DC->cursorx;
2283  }
2284  else if (DC->cursory != si->yStart) {
2285 
2286  r.x = si->item->window.rect.x + si->item->window.rect.w - SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1;
2287  r.y = si->item->window.rect.y + SCROLLBAR_SIZE + 1;
2288  r.h = si->item->window.rect.h - (SCROLLBAR_SIZE*2) - 2;
2289  r.w = SCROLLBAR_SIZE;
2290  max = Item_ListBox_MaxScroll(si->item);
2291  //
2292  pos = (DC->cursory - r.y - SCROLLBAR_SIZE/2) * max / (r.h - SCROLLBAR_SIZE);
2293  if (pos < 0) {
2294  pos = 0;
2295  }
2296  else if (pos > max) {
2297  pos = max;
2298  }
2299  listPtr->startPos = pos;
2300  si->yStart = DC->cursory;
2301  }
2302 
2303  if (DC->realTime > si->nextScrollTime) {
2304  // need to scroll which is done by simulating a click to the item
2305  // this is done a bit sideways as the autoscroll "knows" that the item is a listbox
2306  // so it calls it directly
2307  Item_ListBox_HandleKey(si->item, si->scrollKey, qtrue, qfalse);
2308  si->nextScrollTime = DC->realTime + si->adjustValue;
2309  }
2310 
2311  if (DC->realTime > si->nextAdjustTime) {
2312  si->nextAdjustTime = DC->realTime + SCROLL_TIME_ADJUST;
2313  if (si->adjustValue > SCROLL_TIME_FLOOR) {
2314  si->adjustValue -= SCROLL_TIME_ADJUSTOFFSET;
2315  }
2316  }
2317 }

2319 static void Scroll_Slider_ThumbFunc(void *p) {
2320  float x, value, cursorx;
2321  scrollInfo_t *si = (scrollInfo_t*)p;
2322  editFieldDef_t *editDef = si->item->typeData;
2323 
2324  if (si->item->text) {
2325  x = si->item->textRect.x + si->item->textRect.w + 8;
2326  } else {
2327  x = si->item->window.rect.x;
2328  }
2329 
2330  cursorx = DC->cursorx;
2331 
2332  if (cursorx < x) {
2333  cursorx = x;
2334  } else if (cursorx > x + SLIDER_WIDTH) {
2335  cursorx = x + SLIDER_WIDTH;
2336  }
2337  value = cursorx - x;
2338  value /= SLIDER_WIDTH;
2339  value *= (editDef->maxVal - editDef->minVal);
2340  value += editDef->minVal;
2341  DC->setCVar(si->item->cvar, va("%f", value));
2342 }

2344 void Item_StartCapture(itemDef_t *item, int key) {
2345  int flags;
2346  switch (item->type) {
2347  case ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD:
2348  case ITEM_TYPE_NUMERICFIELD:
2349 
2350  case ITEM_TYPE_LISTBOX:
2351  {
2352  flags = Item_ListBox_OverLB(item, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory);
2353  if (flags & (WINDOW_LB_LEFTARROW | WINDOW_LB_RIGHTARROW)) {
2354  scrollInfo.nextScrollTime = DC->realTime + SCROLL_TIME_START;
2355  scrollInfo.nextAdjustTime = DC->realTime + SCROLL_TIME_ADJUST;
2356  scrollInfo.adjustValue = SCROLL_TIME_START;
2357  scrollInfo.scrollKey = key;
2358  scrollInfo.scrollDir = (flags & WINDOW_LB_LEFTARROW) ? qtrue : qfalse;
2359  scrollInfo.item = item;
2360  captureData = &scrollInfo;
2361  captureFunc = &Scroll_ListBox_AutoFunc;
2362  itemCapture = item;
2363  } else if (flags & WINDOW_LB_THUMB) {
2364  scrollInfo.scrollKey = key;
2365  scrollInfo.item = item;
2366  scrollInfo.xStart = DC->cursorx;
2367  scrollInfo.yStart = DC->cursory;
2368  captureData = &scrollInfo;
2369  captureFunc = &Scroll_ListBox_ThumbFunc;
2370  itemCapture = item;
2371  }
2372  break;
2373  }
2374  case ITEM_TYPE_SLIDER:
2375  {
2376  flags = Item_Slider_OverSlider(item, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory);
2377  if (flags & WINDOW_LB_THUMB) {
2378  scrollInfo.scrollKey = key;
2379  scrollInfo.item = item;
2380  scrollInfo.xStart = DC->cursorx;
2381  scrollInfo.yStart = DC->cursory;
2382  captureData = &scrollInfo;
2383  captureFunc = &Scroll_Slider_ThumbFunc;
2384  itemCapture = item;
2385  }
2386  break;
2387  }
2388  }
2389 }

2395 qboolean Item_Slider_HandleKey(itemDef_t *item, int key, qboolean down) {
2396  float x, value, width, work;
2397 
2398  //DC->Print("slider handle key\n");
2399  if (item->cvar) {
2400  if (key == K_MOUSE1 || key == K_MOUSE2 || key == K_MOUSE3) {
2401  editFieldDef_t *editDef = item->typeData;
2402  if (editDef && Rect_ContainsPoint(&item->window.rect, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory) && item->window.flags & WINDOW_HASFOCUS) {
2403  rectDef_t testRect;
2404  width = SLIDER_WIDTH;
2405  if (item->text) {
2406  x = item->textRect.x + item->textRect.w + 8;
2407  } else {
2408  x = item->window.rect.x;
2409  }
2410 
2411  testRect = item->window.rect;
2412  testRect.x = x;
2413  value = (float)SLIDER_THUMB_WIDTH / 2;
2414  testRect.x -= value;
2415  //DC->Print("slider x: %f\n", testRect.x);
2416  testRect.w = (SLIDER_WIDTH + (float)SLIDER_THUMB_WIDTH / 2);
2417  //DC->Print("slider w: %f\n", testRect.w);
2418  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&testRect, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory)) {
2419  work = DC->cursorx - x;
2420  value = work / width;
2421  value *= (editDef->maxVal - editDef->minVal);
2422  // vm fuckage
2423  // value = (((float)(DC->cursorx - x)/ SLIDER_WIDTH) * (editDef->maxVal - editDef->minVal));
2424  value += editDef->minVal;
2425  DC->setCVar(item->cvar, va("%f", value));
2426  return qtrue;
2427  }
2428  }
2429  } else {
2430  int select = UI_SelectForKey(key);
2431  if (select != 0) {
2432  editFieldDef_t *editDef = item->typeData;
2433  if (editDef) {
2434  // 20 is number of steps
2435  value = DC->getCVarValue(item->cvar) + (((editDef->maxVal - editDef->minVal)/20) * select);
2436 
2437  if (value < editDef->minVal)
2438  value = editDef->minVal;
2439  else if (value > editDef->maxVal)
2440  value = editDef->maxVal;
2441 
2442  DC->setCVar(item->cvar, va("%f", value));
2443  return qtrue;
2444  }
2445  }
2446  }
2447  }
2448  DC->Print("slider handle key exit\n");
2449  return qfalse;
2450 }

2467  return qfalse;

2472  return qfalse;

2474  case ITEM_TYPE_RADIOBUTTON:
2475  return qfalse;
2476  break;
2477  case ITEM_TYPE_CHECKBOX:
2478  return qfalse;
2479  break;

2482  //return Item_TextField_HandleKey(item, key);

2486  return qfalse;
2487  break;
2488  case ITEM_TYPE_LISTBOX:
2489  return Item_ListBox_HandleKey(item, key, down, qfalse);
2490  break;

2493  break;

2505  break;
2506  //case ITEM_TYPE_IMAGE:
2507  // Item_Image_Paint(item);
2508  // break;
2509  default:
2510  return qfalse;
2511  break;
2512  }

2523 itemDef_t *Menu_SetPrevCursorItem(menuDef_t *menu) {
2524  qboolean wrapped = qfalse;
2525  int oldCursor = menu->cursorItem;
2526 
2527  if (menu->cursorItem < 0) {
2528  menu->cursorItem = menu->itemCount-1;
2529  wrapped = qtrue;
2530  }
2531 
2532  while (menu->cursorItem > -1) {
2533 
2534  menu->cursorItem--;
2535  if (menu->cursorItem < 0 && !wrapped) {
2536  wrapped = qtrue;
2537  menu->cursorItem = menu->itemCount -1;
2538  }
2539 
2540  if (Item_SetFocus(menu->items[menu->cursorItem], DC->cursorx, DC->cursory)) {
2541  Menu_HandleMouseMove(menu, menu->items[menu->cursorItem]->window.rect.x + 1, menu->items[menu->cursorItem]->window.rect.y + 1);
2542  return menu->items[menu->cursorItem];
2543  }
2544  }
2545  menu->cursorItem = oldCursor;
2546  return NULL;
2547 
2548 }

2550 itemDef_t *Menu_SetNextCursorItem(menuDef_t *menu) {
2551 
2552  qboolean wrapped = qfalse;
2553  int oldCursor = menu->cursorItem;
2554 
2555 
2556  if (menu->cursorItem == -1) {
2557  menu->cursorItem = 0;
2558  wrapped = qtrue;
2559  }
2560 
2561  while (menu->cursorItem < menu->itemCount) {
2562 
2563  menu->cursorItem++;
2564  if (menu->cursorItem >= menu->itemCount && !wrapped) {
2565  wrapped = qtrue;
2566  menu->cursorItem = 0;
2567  }
2568  if (Item_SetFocus(menu->items[menu->cursorItem], DC->cursorx, DC->cursory)) {
2569  Menu_HandleMouseMove(menu, menu->items[menu->cursorItem]->window.rect.x + 1, menu->items[menu->cursorItem]->window.rect.y + 1);
2570  return menu->items[menu->cursorItem];
2571  }
2572 
2573  }
2574 
2575  menu->cursorItem = oldCursor;
2576  return NULL;
2577 }

2634 void Menus_HandleOOBClick(menuDef_t *menu, int key, qboolean down) {
2635  if (menu) {
2636  int i;
2637  // basically the behaviour we are looking for is if there are windows in the stack.. see if
2638  // the cursor is within any of them.. if not close them otherwise activate them and pass the
2639  // key on.. force a mouse move to activate focus and script stuff
2640  if (down && menu->window.flags & WINDOW_OOB_CLICK) {
2641  Menu_RunCloseScript(menu);
2642  menu->window.flags &= ~(WINDOW_HASFOCUS | WINDOW_VISIBLE);
2643  }
2644 
2645  for (i = 0; i < menuCount; i++) {
2646  if (Menu_OverActiveItem(&Menus[i], DC->cursorx, DC->cursory)) {
2647  Menu_RunCloseScript(menu);
2648  menu->window.flags &= ~(WINDOW_HASFOCUS | WINDOW_VISIBLE);
2649  Menus_Activate(&Menus[i]);
2650  Menu_HandleMouseMove(&Menus[i], DC->cursorx, DC->cursory);
2651  Menu_HandleKey(&Menus[i], key, down);
2652  }
2653  }
2654 
2655  if (Display_VisibleMenuCount() == 0) {
2656  if (DC->Pause) {
2657  DC->Pause(qfalse);
2658  }
2659  }
2660  Display_CloseCinematics();
2661  }
2662 }

2664 static rectDef_t *Item_CorrectedTextRect(itemDef_t *item) {
2665  static rectDef_t rect;
2666  memset(&rect, 0, sizeof(rectDef_t));
2667  if (item) {
2668  rect = item->textRect;
2669  if (rect.w) {
2670  rect.y -= rect.h;
2671  }
2672  }
2673  return &rect;
2674 }

2676 // menu item key horizontal action: -1 = previous value, 1 = next value, 0 = no change
2677 int UI_SelectForKey(int key)
2678 {
2679  switch (key) {
2680  case K_MOUSE1:
2681  case K_MOUSE3:
2682  case K_ENTER:
2683  case K_KP_ENTER:
2684  case K_RIGHTARROW:
2685  case K_KP_RIGHTARROW:
2686  case K_JOY1:
2687  case K_JOY2:
2688  case K_JOY3:
2689  case K_JOY4:
2690  return 1; // next
2691 
2692  case K_MOUSE2:
2693  case K_LEFTARROW:
2694  case K_KP_LEFTARROW:
2695  return -1; // previous
2696  }
2697 
2698  // no change
2699  return 0;
2700 }
2701 
2702 void Menu_HandleKey(menuDef_t *menu, int key, qboolean down) {
2703  int i;
2704  itemDef_t *item = NULL;
2705 
2706  if (g_waitingForKey && down) {
2707  Item_Bind_HandleKey(g_bindItem, key, down);
2708  return;
2709  }
2710 
2711  if (g_editingField && down) {
2712  if (!Item_TextField_HandleKey(g_editItem, key)) {
2713  g_editingField = qfalse;
2714  g_editItem = NULL;
2715  return;
2716  } else if (key == K_MOUSE1 || key == K_MOUSE2 || key == K_MOUSE3) {
2717  g_editingField = qfalse;
2718  g_editItem = NULL;
2719  Display_MouseMove(NULL, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory);
2720  } else if (key == K_TAB || key == K_UPARROW || key == K_DOWNARROW) {
2721  return;
2722  }
2723  }
2724 
2725  if (menu == NULL) {
2726  return;
2727  }
2728 
2729  // see if the mouse is within the window bounds and if so is this a mouse click
2730  if (down && !(menu->window.flags & WINDOW_POPUP) && !Rect_ContainsPoint(&menu->window.rect, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory)) {
2731  static qboolean inHandleKey = qfalse;
2732  if (!inHandleKey && ( key == K_MOUSE1 || key == K_MOUSE2 || key == K_MOUSE3 ) ) {
2733  inHandleKey = qtrue;
2734  Menus_HandleOOBClick(menu, key, down);
2735  inHandleKey = qfalse;
2736  return;
2737  }
2738  }
2739 
2740  // get the item with focus
2741  for (i = 0; i < menu->itemCount; i++) {
2742  if (menu->items[i]->window.flags & WINDOW_HASFOCUS) {
2743  item = menu->items[i];
2744  }
2745  }
2746 
2747  if (item != NULL) {
2748  if (Item_HandleKey(item, key, down)) {
2749  Item_Action(item);
2750  return;
2751  }
2752  }
2753 
2754  if (!down) {
2755  return;
2756  }
2757 
2758  // default handling
2759  switch ( key ) {
2760 
2761  case K_F11:
2762  if (DC->getCVarValue("developer")) {
2763  debugMode ^= 1;
2764  }
2765  break;
2766 
2767  case K_F12:
2768  if (DC->getCVarValue("developer")) {
2769  DC->executeText(EXEC_APPEND, "screenshot\n");
2770  }
2771  break;
2772  case K_KP_UPARROW:
2773  case K_UPARROW:
2774  Menu_SetPrevCursorItem(menu);
2775  break;
2776 
2777  case K_ESCAPE:
2778  if (!g_waitingForKey && menu->onESC) {
2779  itemDef_t it;
2780  it.parent = menu;
2781  Item_RunScript(&it, menu->onESC);
2782  }
2783  break;
2784  case K_TAB:
2785  case K_KP_DOWNARROW:
2786  case K_DOWNARROW:
2787  Menu_SetNextCursorItem(menu);
2788  break;
2789 
2790  case K_MOUSE1:
2791  case K_MOUSE2:
2792  if (item) {
2793  if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_TEXT) {
2794  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(Item_CorrectedTextRect(item), DC->cursorx, DC->cursory)) {
2795  Item_Action(item);
2796  }
2797  } else if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD || item->type == ITEM_TYPE_NUMERICFIELD) {
2798  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&item->window.rect, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory)) {
2799  item->cursorPos = 0;
2800  g_editingField = qtrue;
2801  g_editItem = item;
2802  }
2803  } else {
2804  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&item->window.rect, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory)) {
2805  Item_Action(item);
2806  }
2807  }
2808  }
2809  break;
2810 
2811  case K_JOY1:
2812  case K_JOY2:
2813  case K_JOY3:
2814  case K_JOY4:
2815  case K_AUX1:
2816  case K_AUX2:
2817  case K_AUX3:
2818  case K_AUX4:
2819  case K_AUX5:
2820  case K_AUX6:
2821  case K_AUX7:
2822  case K_AUX8:
2823  case K_AUX9:
2824  case K_AUX10:
2825  case K_AUX11:
2826  case K_AUX12:
2827  case K_AUX13:
2828  case K_AUX14:
2829  case K_AUX15:
2830  case K_AUX16:
2831  case K_KP_ENTER:
2832  case K_ENTER:
2833  if (item) {
2834  if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD || item->type == ITEM_TYPE_NUMERICFIELD) {
2835  item->cursorPos = 0;
2836  g_editingField = qtrue;
2837  g_editItem = item;
2838  } else {
2839  Item_Action(item);
2840  }
2841  }
2842  break;
2843  }
2844 }

2846 void ToWindowCoords(float *x, float *y, windowDef_t *window) {
2847  if (window->border != 0) {
2848  *x += window->borderSize;
2849  *y += window->borderSize;
2850  }
2851  *x += window->rect.x;
2852  *y += window->rect.y;
2853 }

2855 void Rect_ToWindowCoords(rectDef_t *rect, windowDef_t *window) {
2856  ToWindowCoords(&rect->x, &rect->y, window);
2857 }

2859 void Item_SetTextExtents(itemDef_t *item, int *width, int *height, const char *text) {
2860  const char *textPtr = (text) ? text : item->text;
2861 
2862  if (textPtr == NULL ) {
2863  return;
2864  }
2865 
2866  *width = item->textRect.w;
2867  *height = item->textRect.h;
2868 
2869  // keeps us from computing the widths and heights more than once
2870  if (*width == 0 || (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_OWNERDRAW && item->textalignment == ITEM_ALIGN_CENTER)) {
2871  int originalWidth = DC->textWidth(item->text, item->textscale, 0);
2872 
2873  if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_OWNERDRAW && (item->textalignment == ITEM_ALIGN_CENTER || item->textalignment == ITEM_ALIGN_RIGHT)) {
2874  originalWidth += DC->ownerDrawWidth(item->window.ownerDraw, item->textscale);
2875  } else if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD && item->textalignment == ITEM_ALIGN_CENTER && item->cvar) {
2876  char buff[256];
2877  DC->getCVarString(item->cvar, buff, 256);
2878  originalWidth += DC->textWidth(buff, item->textscale, 0);
2879  }
2880 
2881  *width = DC->textWidth(textPtr, item->textscale, 0);
2882  *height = DC->textHeight(textPtr, item->textscale, 0);
2883  item->textRect.w = *width;
2884  item->textRect.h = *height;
2885  item->textRect.x = item->textalignx;
2886  item->textRect.y = item->textaligny;
2887  if (item->textalignment == ITEM_ALIGN_RIGHT) {
2888  item->textRect.x = item->textalignx - originalWidth;
2889  } else if (item->textalignment == ITEM_ALIGN_CENTER) {
2890  item->textRect.x = item->textalignx - originalWidth / 2;
2891  }
2892 
2893  ToWindowCoords(&item->textRect.x, &item->textRect.y, &item->window);
2894  }
2895 }

2897 void Item_TextColor(itemDef_t *item, vec4_t *newColor) {
2898  vec4_t lowLight;
2899  menuDef_t *parent = (menuDef_t*)item->parent;
2900 
2901  Fade(&item->window.flags, &item->window.foreColor[3], parent->fadeClamp, &item->window.nextTime, parent->fadeCycle, qtrue, parent->fadeAmount);
2902 
2903  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_HASFOCUS) {
2904  lowLight[0] = 0.8 * parent->focusColor[0];
2905  lowLight[1] = 0.8 * parent->focusColor[1];
2906  lowLight[2] = 0.8 * parent->focusColor[2];
2907  lowLight[3] = 0.8 * parent->focusColor[3];
2908  LerpColor(parent->focusColor,lowLight,*newColor,0.5+0.5*sin(DC->realTime / PULSE_DIVISOR));
2909  } else if (item->textStyle == ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_BLINK && !((DC->realTime/BLINK_DIVISOR) & 1)) {
2910  lowLight[0] = 0.8 * item->window.foreColor[0];
2911  lowLight[1] = 0.8 * item->window.foreColor[1];
2912  lowLight[2] = 0.8 * item->window.foreColor[2];
2913  lowLight[3] = 0.8 * item->window.foreColor[3];
2914  LerpColor(item->window.foreColor,lowLight,*newColor,0.5+0.5*sin(DC->realTime / PULSE_DIVISOR));
2915  } else {
2916  memcpy(newColor, &item->window.foreColor, sizeof(vec4_t));
2917  // items can be enabled and disabled based on cvars
2918  }
2919 
2920  if (item->enableCvar && *item->enableCvar && item->cvarTest && *item->cvarTest) {
2921  if (item->cvarFlags & (CVAR_ENABLE | CVAR_DISABLE) && !Item_EnableShowViaCvar(item, CVAR_ENABLE)) {
2922  memcpy(newColor, &parent->disableColor, sizeof(vec4_t));
2923  }
2924  }
2925 }

2927 void Item_Text_AutoWrapped_Paint(itemDef_t *item) {
2928  char text[1024];
2929  const char *p, *textPtr, *newLinePtr;
2930  char buff[1024];
2931  int width, height, len, textWidth, newLine, newLineWidth;
2932  float y;
2933  vec4_t color;
2934 
2935  textWidth = 0;
2936  newLinePtr = NULL;
2937 
2938  if (item->text == NULL) {
2939  if (item->cvar == NULL) {
2940  return;
2941  }
2942  else {
2943  DC->getCVarString(item->cvar, text, sizeof(text));
2944  textPtr = text;
2945  }
2946  }
2947  else {
2948  textPtr = item->text;
2949  }
2950  if (*textPtr == '\0') {
2951  return;
2952  }
2953  Item_TextColor(item, &color);
2954  Item_SetTextExtents(item, &width, &height, textPtr);
2955 
2956  y = item->textaligny;
2957  len = 0;
2958  buff[0] = '\0';
2959  newLine = 0;
2960  newLineWidth = 0;
2961  p = textPtr;
2962  while (p) {
2963  if (*p == ' ' || *p == '\t' || *p == '\n' || *p == '\0') {
2964  newLine = len;
2965  newLinePtr = p+1;
2966  newLineWidth = textWidth;
2967  }
2968  textWidth = DC->textWidth(buff, item->textscale, 0);
2969  if ( (newLine && textWidth > item->window.rect.w) || *p == '\n' || *p == '\0') {
2970  if (len) {
2971  if (item->textalignment == ITEM_ALIGN_LEFT) {
2972  item->textRect.x = item->textalignx;
2973  } else if (item->textalignment == ITEM_ALIGN_RIGHT) {
2974  item->textRect.x = item->textalignx - newLineWidth;
2975  } else if (item->textalignment == ITEM_ALIGN_CENTER) {
2976  item->textRect.x = item->textalignx - newLineWidth / 2;
2977  }
2978  item->textRect.y = y;
2979  ToWindowCoords(&item->textRect.x, &item->textRect.y, &item->window);
2980  //
2981  buff[newLine] = '\0';
2982  DC->drawText(item->textRect.x, item->textRect.y, item->textscale, color, buff, 0, 0, item->textStyle);
2983  }
2984  if (*p == '\0') {
2985  break;
2986  }
2987  //
2988  y += height + 5;
2989  p = newLinePtr;
2990  len = 0;
2991  newLine = 0;
2992  newLineWidth = 0;
2993  continue;
2994  }
2995  buff[len++] = *p++;
2996  buff[len] = '\0';
2997  }
2998 }

3000 void Item_Text_Wrapped_Paint(itemDef_t *item) {
3001  char text[1024];
3002  const char *p, *start, *textPtr;
3003  char buff[1024];
3004  int width, height;
3005  float x, y;
3006  vec4_t color;
3007 
3008  // now paint the text and/or any optional images
3009  // default to left
3010 
3011  if (item->text == NULL) {
3012  if (item->cvar == NULL) {
3013  return;
3014  }
3015  else {
3016  DC->getCVarString(item->cvar, text, sizeof(text));
3017  textPtr = text;

3019  }
3020  else {

3024  return;

3039  start += p - start + 1;
3040  p = strchr(p+1, '\r');
3041  }
3042  DC->drawText(x, y, item->textscale, color, start, 0, 0, item->textStyle);
3043 }

3304 /*
3305 =================
3306 Controls_GetKeyAssignment
3307 =================
3308 */
3309 static void Controls_GetKeyAssignment (char *command, int *twokeys)
3310 {
3311  int count;
3312  int j;
3313  char b[256];
3314 
3315  twokeys[0] = twokeys[1] = -1;
3316  count = 0;
3317 
3318  for ( j = 0; j < 256; j++ )
3319  {
3320  DC->getBindingBuf( j, b, 256 );
3321  if ( *b == 0 ) {
3322  continue;
3323  }
3324  if ( !Q_stricmp( b, command ) ) {
3325  twokeys[count] = j;
3326  count++;
3327  if (count == 2) {
3328  break;
3329  }
3330  }
3331  }
3332 }

3442 void BindingFromName(const char *cvar) {
3443  int i, b1, b2;
3444 
3445  // iterate each command, set its default binding
3446  for (i=0; i < g_bindCount; i++)
3447  {
3448  if (Q_stricmp(cvar, g_bindings[i].command) == 0) {
3449  b1 = g_bindings[i].bind1;
3450  if (b1 == -1) {
3451  break;
3452  }
3453  DC->keynumToStringBuf( b1, g_nameBind1, 32 );
3454  Q_strupr(g_nameBind1);
3455 
3456  b2 = g_bindings[i].bind2;
3457  if (b2 != -1)
3458  {
3459  DC->keynumToStringBuf( b2, g_nameBind2, 32 );
3460  Q_strupr(g_nameBind2);
3461  strcat( g_nameBind1, " or " );
3462  strcat( g_nameBind1, g_nameBind2 );
3463  }
3464  return;
3465  }
3466  }
3467  strcpy(g_nameBind1, "???");
3468 }

3537 
3538 qboolean Item_Bind_HandleKey(itemDef_t *item, int key, qboolean down) {
3539  int id;
3540  int i;
3541 
3542  if (!g_waitingForKey)
3543  {
3544  if (down && ((key == K_MOUSE1 && Rect_ContainsPoint(&item->window.rect, DC->cursorx, DC->cursory))
3545  || key == K_ENTER || key == K_KP_ENTER || key == K_JOY1 || key == K_JOY2 || key == K_JOY3 || key == K_JOY4)) {
3546  g_waitingForKey = qtrue;
3547  g_bindItem = item;
3548  }
3549  return qtrue;
3550  }
3551  else
3552  {
3553  if (g_bindItem == NULL) {
3554  return qtrue;
3555  }
3556 
3557  if (key & K_CHAR_FLAG) {
3558  return qtrue;
3559  }
3560 
3561  switch (key)
3562  {
3563  case K_ESCAPE:
3564  g_waitingForKey = qfalse;
3565  return qtrue;
3566 
3567  case K_BACKSPACE:
3568  id = BindingIDFromName(item->cvar);
3569  if (id != -1) {
3570  if( g_bindings[id].bind1 != -1 ) {
3571  DC->setBinding( g_bindings[id].bind1, "" );
3572  g_bindings[id].bind1 = -1;
3573  }
3574  if( g_bindings[id].bind2 != -1 ) {
3575  DC->setBinding( g_bindings[id].bind2, "" );
3576  g_bindings[id].bind2 = -1;
3577  }
3578  }
3579  Controls_SetConfig(qtrue);
3580  g_waitingForKey = qfalse;
3581  g_bindItem = NULL;
3582  return qtrue;
3583 
3584  case '`':
3585  return qtrue;
3586  }
3587  }
3588 
3589  if (key != -1)
3590  {
3591 
3592  for (i=0; i < g_bindCount; i++)
3593  {
3594 
3595  if (g_bindings[i].bind2 == key) {
3596  g_bindings[i].bind2 = -1;
3597  }
3598 
3599  if (g_bindings[i].bind1 == key)
3600  {
3601  g_bindings[i].bind1 = g_bindings[i].bind2;
3602  g_bindings[i].bind2 = -1;
3603  }
3604  }
3605  }
3606 
3607 
3608  id = BindingIDFromName(item->cvar);
3609 
3610  if (id != -1) {
3611  if (key == -1) {
3612  if( g_bindings[id].bind1 != -1 ) {
3613  DC->setBinding( g_bindings[id].bind1, "" );
3614  g_bindings[id].bind1 = -1;
3615  }
3616  if( g_bindings[id].bind2 != -1 ) {
3617  DC->setBinding( g_bindings[id].bind2, "" );
3618  g_bindings[id].bind2 = -1;
3619  }
3620  }
3621  else if (g_bindings[id].bind1 == -1) {
3622  g_bindings[id].bind1 = key;
3623  }
3624  else if (g_bindings[id].bind1 != key && g_bindings[id].bind2 == -1) {
3625  g_bindings[id].bind2 = key;
3626  }
3627  else {
3628  DC->setBinding( g_bindings[id].bind1, "" );
3629  DC->setBinding( g_bindings[id].bind2, "" );
3630  g_bindings[id].bind1 = key;
3631  g_bindings[id].bind2 = -1;
3632  }
3633  }
3634 
3635  Controls_SetConfig(qtrue);
3636  g_waitingForKey = qfalse;
3637 
3638  return qtrue;
3639 }

3643 void AdjustFrom640(float *x, float *y, float *w, float *h) {
3644  //*x = *x * DC->scale + DC->bias;
3645  *x *= DC->xscale;
3646  *y *= DC->yscale;
3647  *w *= DC->xscale;
3648  *h *= DC->yscale;
3649 }

3651 void Item_Model_Paint(itemDef_t *item) {
3652  float x, y, w, h;
3653  refdef_t refdef;
3654  refEntity_t ent;
3655  vec3_t mins, maxs, origin;
3656  vec3_t angles;
3657  modelDef_t *modelPtr = (modelDef_t*)item->typeData;
3658 
3659  if (modelPtr == NULL) {
3660  return;
3661  }
3662 
3663  // setup the refdef
3664  memset( &refdef, 0, sizeof( refdef ) );
3665  refdef.rdflags = RDF_NOWORLDMODEL;
3666  AxisClear( refdef.viewaxis );
3667  x = item->window.rect.x+1;
3668  y = item->window.rect.y+1;
3669  w = item->window.rect.w-2;
3670  h = item->window.rect.h-2;
3671 
3672  AdjustFrom640( &x, &y, &w, &h );
3673 
3674  refdef.x = x;
3675  refdef.y = y;
3676  refdef.width = w;
3677  refdef.height = h;
3678 
3679  DC->modelBounds( item->asset, mins, maxs );
3680 
3681  origin[2] = -0.5 * ( mins[2] + maxs[2] );
3682  origin[1] = 0.5 * ( mins[1] + maxs[1] );
3683 
3684  // calculate distance so the model nearly fills the box
3685  if (qtrue) {
3686  float len = 0.5 * ( maxs[2] - mins[2] );
3687  origin[0] = len / 0.268; // len / tan( fov/2 )
3688  //origin[0] = len / tan(w/2);
3689  } else {
3690  origin[0] = item->textscale;
3691  }
3692  refdef.fov_x = (modelPtr->fov_x) ? modelPtr->fov_x : w;
3693  refdef.fov_y = (modelPtr->fov_y) ? modelPtr->fov_y : h;
3694 
3695  //refdef.fov_x = (int)((float)refdef.width / 640.0f * 90.0f);
3696  //xx = refdef.width / tan( refdef.fov_x / 360 * M_PI );
3697  //refdef.fov_y = atan2( refdef.height, xx );
3698  //refdef.fov_y *= ( 360 / M_PI );
3699 
3700  DC->clearScene();
3701 
3702  refdef.time = DC->realTime;
3703 
3704  // add the model
3705 
3706  memset( &ent, 0, sizeof(ent) );
3707 
3708  //adjust = 5.0 * sin( (float)uis.realtime / 500 );
3709  //adjust = 360 % (int)((float)uis.realtime / 1000);
3710  //VectorSet( angles, 0, 0, 1 );
3711 
3712  // use item storage to track
3713  if (modelPtr->rotationSpeed) {
3714  if (DC->realTime > item->window.nextTime) {
3715  item->window.nextTime = DC->realTime + modelPtr->rotationSpeed;
3716  modelPtr->angle = (int)(modelPtr->angle + 1) % 360;
3717  }
3718  }
3719  VectorSet( angles, 0, modelPtr->angle, 0 );
3720  AnglesToAxis( angles, ent.axis );
3721 
3722  ent.hModel = item->asset;
3723  VectorCopy( origin, ent.origin );
3724  VectorCopy( origin, ent.lightingOrigin );
3725  ent.renderfx = RF_LIGHTING_ORIGIN | RF_NOSHADOW;
3726  VectorCopy( ent.origin, ent.oldorigin );
3727 
3728  DC->addRefEntityToScene( &ent );
3729  DC->renderScene( &refdef );
3730 
3731 }

3741 void Item_ListBox_Paint(itemDef_t *item) {
3742  float x, y, size, thumb;
3743  int count, i;
3744  qhandle_t image;
3745  qhandle_t optionalImage;
3746  listBoxDef_t *listPtr = (listBoxDef_t*)item->typeData;
3747 
3748  // the listbox is horizontal or vertical and has a fixed size scroll bar going either direction
3749  // elements are enumerated from the DC and either text or image handles are acquired from the DC as well
3750  // textscale is used to size the text, textalignx and textaligny are used to size image elements
3751  // there is no clipping available so only the last completely visible item is painted
3752  count = DC->feederCount(item->special);
3753  // default is vertical if horizontal flag is not here
3754  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_HORIZONTAL) {
3755  // draw scrollbar in bottom of the window
3756  // bar
3757  x = item->window.rect.x + 1;
3758  y = item->window.rect.y + item->window.rect.h - SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1;
3759  DC->drawHandlePic(x, y, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, DC->Assets.scrollBarArrowLeft);
3760  x += SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1;
3761  size = item->window.rect.w - (SCROLLBAR_SIZE * 2);
3762  DC->drawHandlePic(x, y, size+1, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, DC->Assets.scrollBar);
3763  x += size - 1;
3764  DC->drawHandlePic(x, y, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, DC->Assets.scrollBarArrowRight);
3765  // thumb
3766  thumb = Item_ListBox_ThumbDrawPosition(item);//Item_ListBox_ThumbPosition(item);
3767  if (thumb > x - SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1) {
3768  thumb = x - SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1;
3769  }
3770  DC->drawHandlePic(thumb, y, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, DC->Assets.scrollBarThumb);
3771  //
3772  listPtr->endPos = listPtr->startPos;
3773  size = item->window.rect.w - 2;
3774  // items
3775  // size contains max available space
3776  if (listPtr->elementStyle == LISTBOX_IMAGE) {
3777  // fit = 0;
3778  x = item->window.rect.x + 1;
3779  y = item->window.rect.y + 1;
3780  for (i = listPtr->startPos; i < count; i++) {
3781  // always draw at least one
3782  // which may overdraw the box if it is too small for the element
3783  image = DC->feederItemImage(item->special, i);
3784  if (image) {
3785  DC->drawHandlePic(x+1, y+1, listPtr->elementWidth - 2, listPtr->elementHeight - 2, image);
3786  }
3787 
3788  if (i == item->cursorPos) {
3789  DC->drawRect(x, y, listPtr->elementWidth-1, listPtr->elementHeight-1, item->window.borderSize, item->window.borderColor);
3790  }
3791 
3792  size -= listPtr->elementWidth;
3793  if (size < listPtr->elementWidth) {
3794  listPtr->drawPadding = size; //listPtr->elementWidth - size;
3795  break;
3796  }
3797  x += listPtr->elementWidth;
3798  listPtr->endPos++;
3799  // fit++;
3800  }
3801  } else {
3802  //
3803  }
3804  } else {
3805  // draw scrollbar to right side of the window
3806  x = item->window.rect.x + item->window.rect.w - SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1;
3807  y = item->window.rect.y + 1;
3808  DC->drawHandlePic(x, y, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, DC->Assets.scrollBarArrowUp);
3809  y += SCROLLBAR_SIZE - 1;
3810

3813  DC->drawHandlePic(x, y, SCROLLBAR_SIZE, size+1, DC->Assets.scrollBar);

3895 void Item_OwnerDraw_Paint(itemDef_t *item) {
3896  if (item == NULL) {
3897  return;
3898  }
3899 
3900  if (DC->ownerDrawItem) {
3901  vec4_t color, lowLight;
3902  menuDef_t *parent = (menuDef_t*)item->parent;
3903  Fade(&item->window.flags, &item->window.foreColor[3], parent->fadeClamp, &item->window.nextTime, parent->fadeCycle, qtrue, parent->fadeAmount);
3904  memcpy(&color, &item->window.foreColor, sizeof(color));
3905  if (item->numColors > 0 && DC->getValue) {
3906  // if the value is within one of the ranges then set color to that, otherwise leave at default
3907  int i;
3908  float f = DC->getValue(item->window.ownerDraw);
3909  for (i = 0; i < item->numColors; i++) {
3910  if (f >= item->colorRanges[i].low && f <= item->colorRanges[i].high) {
3911  memcpy(&color, &item->colorRanges[i].color, sizeof(color));
3912  break;
3913  }
3914  }
3915  }
3916 
3917  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_HASFOCUS) {
3918  lowLight[0] = 0.8 * parent->focusColor[0];
3919  lowLight[1] = 0.8 * parent->focusColor[1];
3920  lowLight[2] = 0.8 * parent->focusColor[2];
3921  lowLight[3] = 0.8 * parent->focusColor[3];
3922  LerpColor(parent->focusColor,lowLight,color,0.5+0.5*sin(DC->realTime / PULSE_DIVISOR));
3923  } else if (item->textStyle == ITEM_TEXTSTYLE_BLINK && !((DC->realTime/BLINK_DIVISOR) & 1)) {
3924  lowLight[0] = 0.8 * item->window.foreColor[0];
3925  lowLight[1] = 0.8 * item->window.foreColor[1];
3926  lowLight[2] = 0.8 * item->window.foreColor[2];
3927  lowLight[3] = 0.8 * item->window.foreColor[3];
3928  LerpColor(item->window.foreColor,lowLight,color,0.5+0.5*sin(DC->realTime / PULSE_DIVISOR));
3929  }
3930 
3931  if (item->cvarFlags & (CVAR_ENABLE | CVAR_DISABLE) && !Item_EnableShowViaCvar(item, CVAR_ENABLE)) {
3932  Com_Memcpy(color, parent->disableColor, sizeof(vec4_t));
3933  }
3934 
3935  if (item->text) {
3936  Item_Text_Paint(item);
3937  if (item->text[0]) {
3938  // +8 is an offset kludge to properly align owner draw items that have text combined with them
3939  DC->ownerDrawItem(item->textRect.x + item->textRect.w + 8, item->window.rect.y, item->window.rect.w, item->window.rect.h, 0, item->textaligny, item->window.ownerDraw, item->window.ownerDrawFlags, item->alignment, item->special, item->textscale, color, item->window.background, item->textStyle );
3940  } else {
3941  DC->ownerDrawItem(item->textRect.x + item->textRect.w, item->window.rect.y, item->window.rect.w, item->window.rect.h, 0, item->textaligny, item->window.ownerDraw, item->window.ownerDrawFlags, item->alignment, item->special, item->textscale, color, item->window.background, item->textStyle );
3942  }
3943  } else {
3944  DC->ownerDrawItem(item->window.rect.x, item->window.rect.y, item->window.rect.w, item->window.rect.h, item->textalignx, item->textaligny, item->window.ownerDraw, item->window.ownerDrawFlags, item->alignment, item->special, item->textscale, color, item->window.background, item->textStyle );
3945  }
3946  }
3947 }
