3950 void Item_Paint(itemDef_t *item) {
3951  vec4_t red;
3952  menuDef_t *parent;
3953 
3954  red[0] = red[3] = 1;
3955  red[1] = red[2] = 0;
3956 
3957  if (item == NULL) {
3958  return;
3959  }
3960 
3961  parent = (menuDef_t*)item->parent;
3962 
3963  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_ORBITING) {
3964  if (DC->realTime > item->window.nextTime) {
3965  float rx, ry, a, c, s, w, h;
3966 
3967  item->window.nextTime = DC->realTime + item->window.offsetTime;
3968  // translate
3969  w = item->window.rectClient.w / 2;
3970  h = item->window.rectClient.h / 2;
3971  rx = item->window.rectClient.x + w - item->window.rectEffects.x;
3972  ry = item->window.rectClient.y + h - item->window.rectEffects.y;
3973  a = 3 * M_PI / 180;
3974  c = cos(a);
3975  s = sin(a);
3976  item->window.rectClient.x = (rx * c - ry * s) + item->window.rectEffects.x - w;
3977  item->window.rectClient.y = (rx * s + ry * c) + item->window.rectEffects.y - h;
3978  Item_UpdatePosition(item);
3979 
3980  }
3981  }
3982 
3983 
3984  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_INTRANSITION) {
3985  if (DC->realTime > item->window.nextTime) {
3986  int done = 0;
3987  item->window.nextTime = DC->realTime + item->window.offsetTime;
3988  // transition the x,y
3989  if (item->window.rectClient.x == item->window.rectEffects.x) {
3990  done++;
3991  } else {
3992  if (item->window.rectClient.x < item->window.rectEffects.x) {
3993  item->window.rectClient.x += item->window.rectEffects2.x;
3994  if (item->window.rectClient.x > item->window.rectEffects.x) {
3995  item->window.rectClient.x = item->window.rectEffects.x;
3996  done++;
3997  }
3998  } else {
3999  item->window.rectClient.x -= item->window.rectEffects2.x;
4000  if (item->window.rectClient.x < item->window.rectEffects.x) {
4001  item->window.rectClient.x = item->window.rectEffects.x;
4002  done++;
4003  }
4004  }
4005  }
4006  if (item->window.rectClient.y == item->window.rectEffects.y) {
4007  done++;
4008  } else {
4009  if (item->window.rectClient.y < item->window.rectEffects.y) {
4010  item->window.rectClient.y += item->window.rectEffects2.y;
4011  if (item->window.rectClient.y > item->window.rectEffects.y) {
4012  item->window.rectClient.y = item->window.rectEffects.y;
4013  done++;
4014  }
4015  } else {
4016  item->window.rectClient.y -= item->window.rectEffects2.y;
4017  if (item->window.rectClient.y < item->window.rectEffects.y) {
4018  item->window.rectClient.y = item->window.rectEffects.y;
4019  done++;
4020  }
4021  }
4022  }
4023  if (item->window.rectClient.w == item->window.rectEffects.w) {
4024  done++;
4025  } else {
4026  if (item->window.rectClient.w < item->window.rectEffects.w) {
4027  item->window.rectClient.w += item->window.rectEffects2.w;
4028  if (item->window.rectClient.w > item->window.rectEffects.w) {
4029  item->window.rectClient.w = item->window.rectEffects.w;
4030  done++;
4031  }
4032  } else {
4033  item->window.rectClient.w -= item->window.rectEffects2.w;
4034  if (item->window.rectClient.w < item->window.rectEffects.w) {
4035  item->window.rectClient.w = item->window.rectEffects.w;
4036  done++;
4037  }
4038  }
4039  }
4040  if (item->window.rectClient.h == item->window.rectEffects.h) {
4041  done++;
4042  } else {
4043  if (item->window.rectClient.h < item->window.rectEffects.h) {
4044  item->window.rectClient.h += item->window.rectEffects2.h;
4045  if (item->window.rectClient.h > item->window.rectEffects.h) {
4046  item->window.rectClient.h = item->window.rectEffects.h;
4047  done++;
4048  }
4049  } else {
4050  item->window.rectClient.h -= item->window.rectEffects2.h;
4051  if (item->window.rectClient.h < item->window.rectEffects.h) {
4052  item->window.rectClient.h = item->window.rectEffects.h;
4053  done++;
4054  }
4055  }
4056  }
4057 
4058  Item_UpdatePosition(item);
4059 
4060  if (done == 4) {
4061  item->window.flags &= ~WINDOW_INTRANSITION;
4062  }
4063 
4064  }
4065  }
4066 
4067  if (item->window.ownerDrawFlags && DC->ownerDrawVisible) {
4068  if (!DC->ownerDrawVisible(item->window.ownerDrawFlags)) {
4069  item->window.flags &= ~WINDOW_VISIBLE;
4070  } else {
4071  item->window.flags |= WINDOW_VISIBLE;
4072  }
4073  }
4074 
4075  if (item->cvarFlags & (CVAR_SHOW | CVAR_HIDE)) {
4076  if (!Item_EnableShowViaCvar(item, CVAR_SHOW)) {
4077  return;
4078  }
4079  }
4080 
4081  if (item->window.flags & WINDOW_TIMEDVISIBLE) {
4082 
4083  }
4084 
4085  if (!(item->window.flags & WINDOW_VISIBLE)) {
4086  return;
4087  }

4090  Window_Paint(&item->window, parent->fadeAmount , parent->fadeClamp, parent->fadeCycle);
4091

4095  color[1] = color[3] = 1;

4098  }
4099 
4100  //DC->drawRect(item->window.rect.x, item->window.rect.y, item->window.rect.w, item->window.rect.h, 1, red);
4101 
4102  switch (item->type) {
4103  case ITEM_TYPE_OWNERDRAW:

4107  case ITEM_TYPE_BUTTON:

4110  case ITEM_TYPE_RADIOBUTTON:
4111  break;
4112  case ITEM_TYPE_CHECKBOX:
4113  break;
4114  case ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD:
4115  case ITEM_TYPE_NUMERICFIELD:
4116  Item_TextField_Paint(item);
4117  break;
4118  case ITEM_TYPE_COMBO:
4119  break;

4121  Item_ListBox_Paint(item);

4124  // Item_Image_Paint(item);

4258 void Menu_HandleMouseMove(menuDef_t *menu, float x, float y) {
4259  int i, pass;
4260  qboolean focusSet = qfalse;
4261 
4262  itemDef_t *overItem;
4263  if (menu == NULL) {
4264  return;
4265  }
4266 
4267  if (!(menu->window.flags & (WINDOW_VISIBLE | WINDOW_FORCED))) {
4268  return;
4269  }
4270 
4271  if (itemCapture) {
4272  //Item_MouseMove(itemCapture, x, y);
4273  return;
4274  }
4275 
4276  if (g_waitingForKey || g_editingField) {
4277  return;
4278  }
4279 
4280  // FIXME: this is the whole issue of focus vs. mouse over..
4281  // need a better overall solution as i don't like going through everything twice
4282  for (pass = 0; pass < 2; pass++) {
4283  for (i = 0; i < menu->itemCount; i++) {
4284  // turn off focus each item
4285  // menu->items[i].window.flags &= ~WINDOW_HASFOCUS;
4286

4288  continue;
4289  }
4290 
4291  // items can be enabled and disabled based on cvars

4293  continue;
4294  }
4295 
4296  if (menu->items[i]->cvarFlags & (CVAR_SHOW | CVAR_HIDE) && !Item_EnableShowViaCvar(menu->items[i], CVAR_SHOW)) {
4297  continue;
4298  }

4300 
4301 
4302  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&menu->items[i]->window.rect, x, y)) {
4303  if (pass == 1) {
4304  overItem = menu->items[i];
4305  if (overItem->type == ITEM_TYPE_TEXT && overItem->text) {
4306  if (!Rect_ContainsPoint(Item_CorrectedTextRect(overItem), x, y)) {
4307  continue;
4308  }
4309  }
4310  // if we are over an item
4311  if (IsVisible(overItem->window.flags)) {
4312  // different one
4313  Item_MouseEnter(overItem, x, y);
4314  // Item_SetMouseOver(overItem, qtrue);
4315 
4316  // if item is not a decoration see if it can take focus
4317  if (!focusSet) {
4318  focusSet = Item_SetFocus(overItem, x, y);
4319  }
4320  }
4321  }
4322  } else if (menu->items[i] && menu->items[i]->window.flags & WINDOW_MOUSEOVER) {
4323  Item_MouseLeave(menu->items[i]);
4324  Item_SetMouseOver(menu->items[i], qfalse);
4325  }
4326  }
4327  }
4328 
4329 }
4330 
4331 void Menu_Paint(menuDef_t *menu, qboolean forcePaint) {
4332  int i;
4333 
4334  if (menu == NULL) {
4335  return;
4336  }
4337 
4338  if (!(menu->window.flags & WINDOW_VISIBLE) && !forcePaint) {
4339  return;
4340  }
4341 
4342  if (menu->window.ownerDrawFlags && DC->ownerDrawVisible && !DC->ownerDrawVisible(menu->window.ownerDrawFlags)) {
4343  return;
4344  }
4345 
4346  if (forcePaint) {
4347  menu->window.flags |= WINDOW_FORCED;
4348  }
4349 
4350  // draw the background if necessary
4351  if (menu->fullScreen) {
4352  // implies a background shader
4353  // FIXME: make sure we have a default shader if fullscreen is set with no background
4354  DC->drawHandlePic( 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, menu->window.background );
4355  } else if (menu->window.background) {
4356  // this allows a background shader without being full screen
4357  //UI_DrawHandlePic(menu->window.rect.x, menu->window.rect.y, menu->window.rect.w, menu->window.rect.h, menu->backgroundShader);
4358  }
4359 
4360  // paint the background and or border
4361  Window_Paint(&menu->window, menu->fadeAmount, menu->fadeClamp, menu->fadeCycle );
4362 
4363  for (i = 0; i < menu->itemCount; i++) {
4364  Item_Paint(menu->items[i]);
4365  }
4366 
4367  if (debugMode) {
4368  vec4_t color;
4369  color[0] = color[2] = color[3] = 1;
4370  color[1] = 0;
4371  DC->drawRect(menu->window.rect.x, menu->window.rect.y, menu->window.rect.w, menu->window.rect.h, 1, color);
4372  }
4373 }

4375 /*
4376 ===============
4377 Item_ValidateTypeData
4378 ===============
4379 */
4380 void Item_ValidateTypeData(itemDef_t *item) {
4381  if (item->typeData) {
4382  return;
4383  }
4384 
4385  if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_LISTBOX) {
4386  item->typeData = UI_Alloc(sizeof(listBoxDef_t));
4387  memset(item->typeData, 0, sizeof(listBoxDef_t));
4388  } else if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD || item->type == ITEM_TYPE_NUMERICFIELD || item->type == ITEM_TYPE_YESNO || item->type == ITEM_TYPE_BIND || item->type == ITEM_TYPE_SLIDER || item->type == ITEM_TYPE_TEXT) {
4389  item->typeData = UI_Alloc(sizeof(editFieldDef_t));
4390  memset(item->typeData, 0, sizeof(editFieldDef_t));
4391  if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD) {
4392  if (!((editFieldDef_t *) item->typeData)->maxPaintChars) {
4393  ((editFieldDef_t *) item->typeData)->maxPaintChars = MAX_EDITFIELD;
4394  }
4395  }
4396  } else if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_MULTI) {
4397  item->typeData = UI_Alloc(sizeof(multiDef_t));
4398  } else if (item->type == ITEM_TYPE_MODEL) {
4399  item->typeData = UI_Alloc(sizeof(modelDef_t));
4400  }
4401 }
4402 
4403 /*
4404 ===============
4405 Keyword Hash
4406 ===============
4407 */
4408 
4409 #define KEYWORDHASH_SIZE 512
4410 
4411 typedef struct keywordHash_s
4412 {
4413  char *keyword;
4414  qboolean (*func)(itemDef_t *item, int handle);
4415  struct keywordHash_s *next;
4416 } keywordHash_t;
4417 
4418 int KeywordHash_Key(char *keyword) {
4419  int hash, i;
4420 
4421  hash = 0;
4422  for (i = 0; keyword[i] != '\0'; i++) {
4423  if (keyword[i] >= 'A' && keyword[i] <= 'Z')
4424  hash += (keyword[i] + ('a' - 'A')) * (119 + i);
4425  else
4426  hash += keyword[i] * (119 + i);
4427  }
4428  hash = (hash ^ (hash >> 10) ^ (hash >> 20)) & (KEYWORDHASH_SIZE-1);
4429  return hash;
4430 }
4431 
4432 void KeywordHash_Add(keywordHash_t *table[], keywordHash_t *key) {
4433  int hash;
4434 
4435  hash = KeywordHash_Key(key->keyword);
4436 /*
4437  if (table[hash]) {
4438  int collision = qtrue;
4439  }
4440 */
4441  key->next = table[hash];
4442  table[hash] = key;
4443 }
4444 
4445 keywordHash_t *KeywordHash_Find(keywordHash_t *table[], char *keyword)
4446 {
4447  keywordHash_t *key;
4448  int hash;
4449 
4450  hash = KeywordHash_Key(keyword);
4451  for (key = table[hash]; key; key = key->next) {
4452  if (!Q_stricmp(key->keyword, keyword))
4453  return key;
4454  }
4455  return NULL;
4456 }

4718  listPtr->columnInfo[i].width = width;
4719  listPtr->columnInfo[i].maxChars = maxChars;
4720  } else {
4721  return qfalse;
4722  }
4723  }
4724  } else {
4725  return qfalse;
4726  }
4727  return qtrue;
4728 }

4993  editPtr->maxPaintChars = maxChars;
4994  return qtrue;
4995 }

5015 qboolean ItemParse_cvarStrList( itemDef_t *item, int handle ) {
5016  pc_token_t token;
5017  multiDef_t *multiPtr;
5018  int pass;
5019 
5020  Item_ValidateTypeData(item);
5021  if (!item->typeData)
5022  return qfalse;
5023  multiPtr = (multiDef_t*)item->typeData;
5024  multiPtr->count = 0;
5025  multiPtr->strDef = qtrue;
5026  multiPtr->videoMode = qfalse;
5027 
5028  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
5029  return qfalse;
5030  if (*token.string != '{') {
5031  return qfalse;
5032  }
5033 
5034  pass = 0;
5035  while ( 1 ) {
5036  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token)) {
5037  PC_SourceError(handle, "end of file inside menu item");
5038  return qfalse;
5039  }
5040 
5041  if (*token.string == '}') {
5042  return qtrue;
5043  }
5044 
5045  if (*token.string == ',' || *token.string == ';') {
5046  continue;
5047  }
5048 
5049  if (pass == 0) {
5050  multiPtr->cvarList[multiPtr->count] = String_Alloc(token.string);
5051  pass = 1;
5052  } else {
5053  multiPtr->cvarStr[multiPtr->count] = String_Alloc(token.string);
5054  pass = 0;
5055  multiPtr->count++;
5056  if (multiPtr->count >= MAX_MULTI_CVARS) {
5057  return qfalse;
5058  }
5059  }
5060 
5061  }
5062  return qfalse;
5063 }

5273  { "1.50:1", "3:2" },

5281 /*
5282 ===============
5283 UI_ResolutionToAspect
5284 ===============
5285 */
5286 static void UI_ResolutionToAspect( const char *resolution, char *aspect, size_t aspectLength ) {
5287  int i, w, h;
5288  char *x;
5289  char str[8];
5290 
5291  // calculate resolution's aspect ratio
5292  x = strchr( resolution, 'x' ) + 1;
5293  Q_strncpyz( str, resolution, MIN( x-resolution, sizeof( str ) ) );
5294  w = atoi( str );
5295  h = atoi( x );
5296  Com_sprintf( aspect, aspectLength, "%.2f:1", (float)w / (float)h );
5297 
5298  // rename common ratios ("1.33:1" -> "4:3")
5299  for( i = 0; knownRatios[i][0]; i++ ) {
5300  if( !Q_stricmp( aspect, knownRatios[i][0] ) ) {
5301  Q_strncpyz( aspect, knownRatios[i][1], aspectLength );
5302  break;
5303  }
5304  }
5305 }
5306 
5307 /*
5308 ===============
5309 Item_ApplyHacks
5310 
5311 Hacks to fix issues with Team Arena menu scripts
5312 ===============
5313 */
5314 static void Item_ApplyHacks( itemDef_t *item ) {
5315 
5316  // Fix length of favorite address in createfavorite.menu
5317  if ( item->type == ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD && item->cvar && !Q_stricmp( item->cvar, "ui_favoriteAddress" ) ) {
5318  editFieldDef_t *editField = (editFieldDef_t *)item->typeData;
5319 
5320  // enough to hold an IPv6 address plus null
5321  if ( editField->maxChars < 48 ) {
5322  Com_Printf( "Extended create favorite address edit field length to hold an IPv6 address\n" );
5323  editField->maxChars = 48;
5324  }
5325  }
5326 
5327  if ( item->type == ITEM_TYPE_EDITFIELD && item->cvar && ( !Q_stricmp( item->cvar, "ui_Name" ) || !Q_stricmp( item->cvar, "ui_findplayer" ) ) ) {
5328  editFieldDef_t *editField = (editFieldDef_t *)item->typeData;
5329 
5330  // enough to hold a full player name
5331  if ( editField->maxChars < MAX_NAME_LENGTH ) {
5332  if ( editField->maxPaintChars > editField->maxChars ) {
5333  editField->maxPaintChars = editField->maxChars;
5334  }
5335 
5336  Com_Printf( "Extended player name field using cvar %s to %d characters\n", item->cvar, MAX_NAME_LENGTH );
5337  editField->maxChars = MAX_NAME_LENGTH;
5338  }
5339  }
5340 
5341  // Replace mode list and use a temporary ui_videomode cvar for handling custom modes
5342  if ( item->type == ITEM_TYPE_MULTI && item->cvar && !Q_stricmp( item->cvar, "r_mode" ) ) {
5343  multiDef_t *multiPtr = (multiDef_t*)item->typeData;
5344  int i, oldCount;
5345  char resbuf[MAX_STRING_CHARS];
5346  char modeName[32], aspect[8];
5347 
5348  item->cvar = "ui_videomode";
5349  multiPtr->strDef = qtrue;
5350  multiPtr->videoMode = qtrue;
5351 
5352  oldCount = multiPtr->count;
5353  multiPtr->count = 0;
5354 
5355  DC->getCVarString( "r_availableModes", resbuf, sizeof( resbuf ) );
5356 
5357  if ( *resbuf ) {
5358  char *s = resbuf, *mode;
5359 
5360  while ( s && multiPtr->count < MAX_MULTI_CVARS ) {
5361  mode = s;
5362 
5363  s = strchr(s, ' ');
5364  if( s )
5365  *s++ = '\0';
5366 
5367  UI_ResolutionToAspect( mode, aspect, sizeof( aspect ) );
5368  Com_sprintf( modeName, sizeof( modeName ), "%s (%s)", mode, aspect );
5369 
5370  multiPtr->cvarList[multiPtr->count] = String_Alloc( modeName );
5371 
5372  for ( i = 0; builtinResolutions[i]; i++ ) {
5373  if( !Q_stricmp( builtinResolutions[i], mode ) ) {
5374  multiPtr->cvarStr[multiPtr->count] = builtinResolutions[i];
5375  multiPtr->cvarValue[multiPtr->count] = i;
5376  break;
5377  }
5378  }
5379 
5380  if ( builtinResolutions[i] == NULL ) {
5381  multiPtr->cvarStr[multiPtr->count] = String_Alloc( mode );
5382  multiPtr->cvarValue[multiPtr->count] = -1;
5383  }
5384 
5385  multiPtr->count++;
5386  }
5387  } else {
5388  for ( i = 0; builtinResolutions[i] && multiPtr->count < MAX_MULTI_CVARS; i++ ) {
5389  UI_ResolutionToAspect( builtinResolutions[i], aspect, sizeof( aspect ) );
5390  Com_sprintf( modeName, sizeof( modeName ), "%s (%s)", builtinResolutions[i], aspect );
5391 
5392  multiPtr->cvarList[multiPtr->count] = String_Alloc( modeName );
5393  multiPtr->cvarStr[multiPtr->count] = builtinResolutions[i];
5394  multiPtr->cvarValue[multiPtr->count] = i;
5395  multiPtr->count++;
5396  }
5397  }
5398 
5399  // Add custom resolution if not in mode list
5400  if ( multiPtr->count < MAX_MULTI_CVARS ) {
5401  char currentResolution[20];
5402 
5403  Com_sprintf( currentResolution, sizeof ( currentResolution ), "%dx%d", DC->glconfig.vidWidth, DC->glconfig.vidHeight );
5404  for ( i = 0; i < multiPtr->count; i++ ) {
5405  if ( !Q_stricmp( multiPtr->cvarStr[i], currentResolution ) ) {
5406  break;
5407  }
5408  }
5409 
5410  if ( i == multiPtr->count ) {
5411  UI_ResolutionToAspect( currentResolution, aspect, sizeof( aspect ) );
5412  Com_sprintf( modeName, sizeof( modeName ), "%s (%s)", currentResolution, aspect );
5413 
5414  multiPtr->cvarList[multiPtr->count] = String_Alloc( modeName );
5415  multiPtr->cvarStr[multiPtr->count] = String_Alloc( currentResolution );
5416  multiPtr->cvarValue[multiPtr->count] = -1;
5417  multiPtr->count++;
5418  }
5419  }
5420 
5421  Com_Printf( "Found video mode list with %d modes, replaced list with %d modes\n", oldCount, multiPtr->count );
5422  }
5423 
5424 }
5425 
5426 /*
5427 ===============
5428 Item_Parse
5429 ===============
5430 */
5431 qboolean Item_Parse(int handle, itemDef_t *item) {
5432  pc_token_t token;
5433  keywordHash_t *key;
5434 
5435 
5436  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
5437  return qfalse;
5438  if (*token.string != '{') {
5439  return qfalse;
5440  }
5441  while ( 1 ) {
5442  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token)) {
5443  PC_SourceError(handle, "end of file inside menu item");
5444  return qfalse;
5445  }
5446 
5447  if (*token.string == '}') {
5448  Item_ApplyHacks( item );
5449  return qtrue;
5450  }
5451 
5452  key = KeywordHash_Find(itemParseKeywordHash, token.string);
5453  if (!key) {
5454  PC_SourceError(handle, "unknown menu item keyword %s", token.string);
5455  continue;
5456  }
5457  if ( !key->func(item, handle) ) {
5458  PC_SourceError(handle, "couldn't parse menu item keyword %s", token.string);
5459  return qfalse;
5460  }
5461  }
5462  return qfalse;
5463 }

5471  }

5474  item->cursorPos = 0;
5475  if (listPtr) {
5476  listPtr->cursorPos = 0;
5477  listPtr->startPos = 0;
5478  listPtr->endPos = 0;
5479  listPtr->cursorPos = 0;
5480  }
5481  }
5482 }

5821 
5822 keywordHash_t *menuParseKeywordHash[KEYWORDHASH_SIZE];
5823 
5824 /*
5825 ===============
5826 Menu_SetupKeywordHash
5827 ===============
5828 */
5829 void Menu_SetupKeywordHash(void) {
5830  int i;
5831 
5832  memset(menuParseKeywordHash, 0, sizeof(menuParseKeywordHash));
5833  for (i = 0; menuParseKeywords[i].keyword; i++) {
5834  KeywordHash_Add(menuParseKeywordHash, &menuParseKeywords[i]);
5835  }
5836 }
5837 
5838 /*
5839 ===============
5840 Menu_Parse
5841 ===============
5842 */
5843 qboolean Menu_Parse(int handle, menuDef_t *menu) {
5844  pc_token_t token;
5845  keywordHash_t *key;
5846 
5847  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token))
5848  return qfalse;
5849  if (*token.string != '{') {
5850  return qfalse;
5851  }
5852 
5853  while ( 1 ) {
5854 
5855  memset(&token, 0, sizeof(pc_token_t));
5856  if (!trap_PC_ReadToken(handle, &token)) {
5857  PC_SourceError(handle, "end of file inside menu");
5858  return qfalse;
5859  }
5860 
5861  if (*token.string == '}') {
5862  return qtrue;
5863  }
5864 
5865  key = KeywordHash_Find(menuParseKeywordHash, token.string);
5866  if (!key) {
5867  PC_SourceError(handle, "unknown menu keyword %s", token.string);
5868  continue;
5869  }
5870  if ( !key->func((itemDef_t*)menu, handle) ) {
5871  PC_SourceError(handle, "couldn't parse menu keyword %s", token.string);
5872  return qfalse;
5873  }
5874  }
5875  return qfalse;
5876 }
5877 
5878 /*
5879 ===============
5880 Menu_New
5881 ===============
5882 */
5883 void Menu_New(int handle) {
5884  menuDef_t *menu = &Menus[menuCount];
5885 
5886  if (menuCount < MAX_MENUS) {
5887  Menu_Init(menu);
5888  if (Menu_Parse(handle, menu)) {
5889  Menu_PostParse(menu);
5890  menuCount++;
5891  }
5892  }
5893 }
5894

6032 static qboolean Menu_OverActiveItem(menuDef_t *menu, float x, float y) {
6033  if (menu && menu->window.flags & (WINDOW_VISIBLE | WINDOW_FORCED)) {
6034  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&menu->window.rect, x, y)) {
6035  int i;
6036  for (i = 0; i < menu->itemCount; i++) {
6037  // turn off focus each item
6038  // menu->items[i].window.flags &= ~WINDOW_HASFOCUS;
6039 
6040  if (!(menu->items[i]->window.flags & (WINDOW_VISIBLE | WINDOW_FORCED))) {
6041  continue;
6042  }
6043 
6044  if (menu->items[i]->window.flags & WINDOW_DECORATION) {
6045  continue;
6046  }
6047 
6048  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(&menu->items[i]->window.rect, x, y)) {
6049  itemDef_t *overItem = menu->items[i];
6050  if (overItem->type == ITEM_TYPE_TEXT && overItem->text) {
6051  if (Rect_ContainsPoint(Item_CorrectedTextRect(overItem), x, y)) {
6052  return qtrue;
6053  } else {
6054  continue;
6055  }
6056  } else {
6057  return qtrue;
6058  }
6059  }
6060  }
6061 
6062  }
6063  }
6064  return qfalse;
6065 }
